snippet.title: Amber Heard Welcomes First Baby, Daughter Oonagh Paige | PEOPLE
snippet.description:
Amber Heard is a mom!

On Thursday, the actress, 35, announced the happy news on Instagram, posting a mother-daughter photo to introduce her now-12-week-old baby Oonagh Paige to her fans.

"I'm so excited to share this news with you. Four years ago, I decided I wanted to have a child. I wanted to do it on my own terms. I now appreciate how radical it is for us as women to think about one of the most fundamental parts of our destinies in this way," Heard wrote in the caption of her post, alluding to surrogacy as her path to parenthood.

snippet.title: La Doble Vida De Amber Heard Completamente Revelada
snippet.description:
Amber Heard tiene una impresionante carrera en el cine, pero es probable que tambi√©n conozcas por su vida personal, que muchas veces fue el centro de atenci√≥n de los medios. Estas son algunas cosas que tal vez no sab√≠as sobre la vida de Amber Heard.

Heard y su ahora ex-esposo Johnny Depp se conocieron en el 2012 en el set de Diario de un Seductor y se casaron en el 2015. En mayo del 2016, Heard solicit√≥ el divorcio y lo acus√≥ de abuso dom√©stico. Heard escribi√≥ en la declaraci√≥n,

"Durante toda nuestra relaci√≥n, Johnny fue verbal y f√≠sicamente abusivo conmigo. Soport√© un excesivo abuso emocional, verbal y f√≠sico de Johnny, que ha incluido ataques furiosos, hostiles, humillantes y amenazantes hacia m√≠ cada vez que yo cuestionaba su autoridad o no estaba de acuerdo con √©l."

Heard tambi√©n present√≥ una foto en donde aparece con la cara lastimada. Afirm√≥ que la herida fue causada por un golpe de Depp con su tel√©fono. Ella le dijo al tribunal,

"Vivo con el temor de que Johnny vuelva a [nuestra casa] sin avisar para aterrorizarme, f√≠sica y emocionalmente."

Pero la polic√≠a no encontr√≥ pruebas de ninguna agresi√≥n cuando respondi√≥ a una llamada por pelea dom√©stica en la casa de la pareja en mayo del 2016, y Heard se neg√≥ a presentar una denuncia penal. El abogado de Depp le dijo a la corte,

"[Heard] est√° intentando asegurar una resoluci√≥n financiera prematura alegando abuso. Johnny no puede protegerse a s√≠ mismo ni a Amber del escrutinio de los medios."

Mientras que Heard acus√≥ a Depp de violencia dom√©stica, ella fue arrestada por presunta violencia dom√©stica contra su ex pareja, la fot√≥grafa Tasya van Ree, en septiembre del 2009. Seg√∫n TMZ, Heard y van Ree discutieron en un aeropuerto, y Heard presuntamente golpe√≥ a van Ree. Fue arrestada y fichada por un delito menor de violencia dom√©stica, pero el fiscal se neg√≥ a seguir adelante con el caso, porque ambas mujeres viv√≠an en California.

A√±os despu√©s, van Ree dijo p√∫blicamente que el incidente fue "sobresensacionalizado," y describi√≥ a los oficiales que hicieron el arresto como "homof√≥bicos" - pero en realidad la oficial es una mujer gay, y escribi√≥ en Facebook,

"¬°No soy homof√≥bica en lo absoluto! [...] El arresto se hizo porque hubo una agresi√≥n (yo lo presenci√©) y las partes involucradas estaban en una relaci√≥n dom√©stica."

Van Ree tambi√©n emiti√≥ una declaraci√≥n cuando los informes del arresto resurgieron en el 2016, diciendo,

"Es desgarrador que la integridad y la historia de Amber sean cuestionadas una vez m√°s. Amber es una mujer brillante, honesta y hermosa y tengo el mayor respeto por ella. Compartimos 5 maravillosos a√±os juntas y mantenemos contacto hasta el d√≠a de hoy."

#AmberHeard

snippet.title: Jason Momoa Says HE HATES Working With Amber Heard!!! (IG LIVE)
snippet.description:
Jason Momoa Tells Fans The Onset Relationship Between Him and Amber Heard On Instagram Live!!

Subscribe to The Spotlight üëâ  https://bit.ly/3txAgy1

WATCH NEXT: ‚ñ∂Ô∏è

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6vH_1E0jJN8&t=22s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YVPyBraRags&t=12s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZJawm0jcmY8&t=2s

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

RELATED VIDEOS:üëá

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jka1JsBBmCU

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ShObyc9vqXM&t=96s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g7QY3uedq5k


Whereas, the once-famous actress is having a difficult time coping and contacting many of the Hollywood stars including one of her close friends Jason Momoa. Yes, mate it is what it is...

The Aquaman star, Jason eventually opened up on his relationship with Amber Heard and what he feels about her. Well, we all know how fun and interesting the kind of a guy Jason Momoa is. Jason is everyone's favourite (laughing)

Adding on a valuable tip for you, try to stay calm and patient around him, Jason really can't see anyone sitting calm, he's a real attention seeker. If the word "attention seeker" is given to someone ever in the future, I would request the officials to kindly give it to Jason Momoa. , 

Well as I already mentioned, Jason would never attempt any prank that can harm a person in any way. We must just agree that we adore and love him a lot. And on the other hand, Jason never forgets to charm ladies, with his hot looks and of course beautiful smile. Who called him Jason Momoa and not Jason the charmer? (laughing)
Speaking about Jason Momoa's and Amber Heard's bond, they really get along well together, but as you all know things never stay the same. Jason's and Amber's friendship bond was affected after Jason decided to play a master prank on Amber Heard.

Once while shooting for Aquaman, the charming yet playful Star  Jason Momoa, played a sick prank on Amber heard. Well, what he did was truly sad and tragic. It's like you have made a sandhill and out of nowhere a random person comes and destroys your sandhill. Did you feel that pain now?

Well, Jason didn't ruin Amber Heard's Sandhill (laughs jokingly) but did something the same that left Amber Heard sad all day long. Let me break this down for you, The Game of Thrones star, intentionally in the name of prank, tore the last ten pages of Amber Heard books that she regularly used to read in between shots and takes... Like, yes!!!

Shockingly Jason did that, I don't know why that doesn't sound like a Big deal to him, but it is...And guess what? Amber's a bookworm (oops Jason, you shouldn't have done that) But what's done is done (laughing nervously) We feel you, Amber!!

Amber Heard shared all the incident, where Jason went to keep her attention on set, she confessed, " I love Jason we had so much fun together but he is allergic to being ignored and I'm a bookworm who loves to read the books, he adopted this method of ripping out the pages of my book so I would pay attention to him". Poor Amber...

Whereas, the crew staff was helpful to Amber Heard, due to Jason's book ripping pranks the crew on the set of Aquaman designed a book bag out of green screen material so that Amber could carry her books on set with her and read between takes.

"I would feel so bad if someone was going out of  their way to throw her book to her but they could tell I was going crazy so the wardrobe built me a book bag" Amber stated in the interview with Good Morning America..."

Delving into the history, Amber Heard's personal life problem which is no more limited to her speaks a lot about her behaviour and the kind of a person she is. As we all know that Amber Heard and Johnny Depp are hooked into the legal drama, things seem to slip out of Dear Amber's hand. 

Talking about the legal drama, the case eventually took a u-turn resulting in a case favouring Johnny Depp. The recent leaked audio call and bodycam footage revealed the true colours of Aquaman star Amber Heard. Accepting the fact that Johnny Depp was never the abuser it was Amber Heard who physically abused Johnny Depp celebrity news clevver news entertainment news information overload inform overload johnny depp appeal amber heard aquaman 2 informoverload amber heard petition

However, the Warner brothers never reacted to the demand of fans, asking to kick out Amber Heard from the Aquaman 2, while they had already kicked Johnny out of 'the pirates of Caribbean series. 

Johnny Depp fans tweeted in his favour and asked that Heard should be fired from Aquaman 2. While one of Johnny's fans tweeted writing " I don't understand why Warner brothers fired Johnny Depp but not Amber Heard, they both have evidence of being abused by each other, and abusive women are rarely held to the same standard as abusive men".

#AmberHeard #JasonMomoa #Aquaman2 #JohnnyDepp #JusticeForDepp #TheSpotlight

"I would feel so bad if someone was going out of  their way to throw her book to her but they could tell I was going crazy so the wardrobe built me a book bag" Amber stated in the interview with Good Morning America..."

However, the Warner brothers never reacted to the demand of fans, asking to kick out Amber Heard from the Aquaman 2, while they had already kicked Johnny out of 'the pirates of Caribbean series. 

Johnny Depp fans tweeted in his favour and asked that Heard should be fired from Aquaman 2. While one of Johnny's fans tweeted writing " I don't understand why Warner brothers fired Johnny Depp but not Amber Heard, they both have evidence of being abused by each other, and abusive women are rarely held to the same standard as abusive men".

Amber Heard Lawyers QUIT And Say That She Never Stood a Chance (INTERVIEW)

Johnny Depp‚Äôs defamation court case against Amber Heard just hit another snafu after briefly being held up due to global events, only recently getting the greenlight to go to trial. The new bump in the road is because Amber Heard‚Äôs legal team, headed up by Roberta Kaplan but also including John Quinn, Julie Fink, Davida Brook, have quit. Roberta Kaplan is a well-known lawyer. She‚Äôs associated with the Times Up movement in Los Angeles and co-founded that movement‚Äôs legal defense fund. However, the defamation case against Amber Heard isn‚Äôt happening in Los Angeles.

Per documents, Amber Heard signed off on and is fine with the change. Instead of being represented by Kaplan Hecker and Fink LL she will switch to local counsel. The organization cited ‚Äútravel and logistics‚Äù becoming ‚Äúmore costly in light of the pandemic‚Äù as the reasons for bowing out. snippet.title: Johnny Depp fans demand Amber Heard is sacked from Aquaman - producer responds ( Magazine News )
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp fans demand Amber Heard is sacked from Aquaman - producer responds ( Magazine News )

JOHNNY DEPP fans will not be successful in trying to "pressure" Aquaman 2 bosses into sacking the star's ex-wife, Amber Heard.

After Johnny Depp and Amber Heard clashed in a public court case over claims the Pirates of the Caribbean star was a "wife-beater", a petition was started. The online appeal was made by Depp's fans who called for Heard to be sacked from the upcoming DC Comics movie, Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom. The petition, titled "Remove Amber Heard from Aquaman 2", has ‚Äãgained ‚Äãmore than 1.85 million signatures at the time of writing.

In response to this petition Heard said last year: "Paid rumours and paid campaigns on social media don‚Äôt dictate [casting decisions] because they have no basis in reality.

"Only the fans actually made Aquaman and Aquaman 2 happen. I‚Äôm excited to get started next year." (Via Entertainment Weekly)

Now, the producer of Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom has responded to the popular petition.

Peter Safran ‚Äãsaid: "I don‚Äôt think we‚Äôre ever going to react to, honestly, pure fan pressure." (Via Deadline)

Safran went on: "You gotta do what‚Äôs best for the movie.

"We felt that if it‚Äôs James Wan and Jason Momoa, it should be Amber Heard. That‚Äôs really what it was."

Addressing the ongoing campaign against Heard led by Depp fans, the Hollywood executive added: "One is not unaware of what is going on in the Twitter-verse.

"But that doesn‚Äôt mean you have to react to it or take it as gospel or accede to their wishes."

Safran repeated: "You have to do what‚Äôs right for the film, and that‚Äôs really where we landed on it."

Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom is currently due out late next year, but it has already been granted a stunning cast of actors.

Not only are Momoa and Heard reprising their roles of Arthur Curry and Mera respectively, they will ‚Äãalso ‚Äãbe joined by a legendary Star Wars villain ‚Äãactor ‚Äãonce again.

Boba Fett star Temuera Morrison will be reprising his role as Arthur's father, Thomas Curry.

Earlier this year Morrison exclusively gave‚Äã Express.co.uk‚Äã the first details about his Aquaman return‚Äã.‚Äã

He revealed: "I'm coming out [to shoot] in September. I think they want to do another one... I think they start earlier."

When pressed about his storyline, Temuera would only say: "I'm not in it that long!"

The Mandalorian actor also recalled some fond memories of working on the first Aquaman movie.

Temuera said: "Yes, they gave me a wig and made me look younger! James Wan was there.

"I think I got the part because Jason [Momoa] loved [1994 film] Once Were Warriors [which Temuera starred in].

"Jason was a big mover because he wanted me to play his dad and the studio got talking and I met the casting agent... and yeah next minute I'm there."

snippet.title: 8 Times Johnny Depp Tried To WARN Us About Amber Heard!!
snippet.description:
8 Times Johnny Depp Tried To WARN Us About Amber Heard...

Subscribe to The Spotlight üëâ  https://bit.ly/3txAgy1

WATCH NEXT: ‚ñ∂Ô∏è

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YVPyBraRags

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


RELATED VIDEOS:üëá

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GShctSD8HNg&t=117s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J1UXydaYri4&t=39s

#8: The Divorce In 2016
The reasons she provided for her taking this decision involved her accusing Depp of being an abuser, which was in fact quite shocking to his fans as well as the people who worked with Depp, as this side of Johnny was never witnessed by them.  Initially, everyone was siding with Amber, but eventually, the truth about Heards violent nature came out. At the time of the divorce between the two celebs, Depp was hushed and his word meant nothing as opposed to Ambers. When Amber provided the court with such reasons, Depp denied these accusations and even stated that all this was being done by Amber in her best interests, and not his. 

#7: The Lawsuit In 2019
The messes the two of them were drowning in were further worsened by the onset of a lawsuit. And no, this time it wasn‚Äôt filed by Amber, but in fact against her! Amber Heard expressed her feelings about Johnny Depp, using explicit content in an article published by the Washington Post, injuring Depp‚Äôs reputation, which led to the beginning of the 50 million dollar suit against Amber Heard. 

#6: Leaks Of Audio 2015
The audio leaks seemed to be the turning point for Depp‚Äôs ill fate as this was one of the most solid forms of proof that helped enable him to be proved as the innocent in the messy trial.What did the leaked audio messages contain? The conversations between the two were as toxic as their marriage. It involved a lot of content that went along the lines of them being involved in domestic violence, her being the main abuser. 

#5: Severed Fingertip
If Amber truly was the one to have faced being physically harmed why was Depp‚Äôs finger left severed? According to various sources, including Johnny Depp himself, Amber Heard injured Depp‚Äôs finger due to a heated argument that broke out between the two of them, resulting in him having to rush to the emergency room to get it fixed. In an interview, she claims he was the one who would constantly hurl things at her, when in fact later on it was proved it was just quite the opposite that was happening behind closed doors. 

#4: Depp's Bruised Face 2020 & Amber's Fake Bruises
To what extent this woman went to prove her innocence is quite disgusting we must say. At one point, Amber had exposed her scarring and bruising on social media to damage Depp. On investigating further into Amber‚Äôs bruises, they seemed to be fake as the next day she made an appearance with no trace of even a single scratch on her. 

#3: Premiere of Alice Through The Looking Glass
Depp did a fabulous job in the movie Alice Through The Looking Glass. His fans were quite enlightened with his presence on the day of its premiere, but the same cannot be said about Johnny Depp! Unfortunately, we all assumed his speech to include his dark humor which he constantly brings out from time to time but indeed many believe it to be a cry for help. He mentioned being in pain, being tired, and wanting to go home.


#2: Career 2016 Onwards
It is quite a well-known fact that once someone is surrounded by constant negativity, this not only takes a toll on their mental health but also starts affecting their professional life too. Depp met Amber on the sets of The Rum Diary, and both were happily married then. Depp fell into Amber‚Äôs trap, both ending their marriages and marrying each other a few years later. Depp was quite a huge hit in Hollywood. Everyone wanted to hire him. The array of films he was getting by the year was massive and all he was doing at every award function was hoarding awards. It is quite evident that following 2016, things for him took a turn downhill professionally. 

#1: Mother
Depp‚Äôs mother was quite well known for her difficult nature. Apparently, it was said Johnny was the only person who could tolerate her cruel nature. It was till her very end that he stood by her side and tended to all of her needs. If Depp could respect such a woman till her last breath, why would he ever harm someone who he claimed to have loved? There is no answer to that question by anyone but stands as a self-explanatory form of evidence to prove Depp was not the kind of man to hurt any woman, especially Amber. #8: The Divorce In 2016
The reasons she provided for her taking this decision involved her accusing Depp of being an abuser, which was in fact quite shocking to his fans as well as the people who worked with Depp, as this side of Johnny was never witnessed by them.  Initially, everyone was siding with Amber, but eventually, the truth about Heards violent nature came out. At the time of the divorce between the two celebs, Depp was hushed and his word meant nothing as opposed to Ambers. When Amber provided the court with such reasons, Depp denied these accusations and even stated that all this was being done by Amber in her best interests, and not his. 

#7: The Lawsuit In 2019
The messes the two of them were drowning in were further worsened by the onset of a lawsuit. And no, this time it wasn‚Äôt filed by Amber, but in fact against her! Amber Heard expressed her feelings about Johnny Depp, using explicit content in an article published by the Washington Post, injuring Depp‚Äôs reputation, which led to the beginning of the 50 million dollar suit against Amber Heard. 

#6: Leaks Of Audio 2015
The audio leaks seemed to be the turning point for Depp‚Äôs ill fate as this was one of the most solid forms of proof that helped enable him to be proved as the innocent in the messy trial.What did the leaked audio messages contain? The conversations between the two were as toxic as their marriage. It involved a lot of content that went along the lines of them being involved in domestic violence, her being the main abuser. 

#5: Severed Fingertip
If Amber truly was the one to have faced being physically harmed why was Depp‚Äôs finger left severed? According to various sources, including Johnny Depp himself, Amber Heard injured Depp‚Äôs finger due to a heated argument that broke out between the two of them, resulting in him having to rush to the emergency room to get it fixed. In an interview, she claims he was the one who would constantly hurl things at her, when in fact later on it was proved it was just quite the opposite that was happening behind closed doors. 

#4: Depp's Bruised Face 2020 & Amber's Fake Bruises
To what extent this woman went to prove her innocence is quite disgusting we must say. At one point, Amber had exposed her scarring and bruising on social media to damage Depp. On investigating further into Amber‚Äôs bruises, they seemed to be fake as the next day she made an appearance with no trace of even a single scratch on her. 

#3: Premiere of Alice Through The Looking Glass
Depp did a fabulous job in the movie Alice Through The Looking Glass. His fans were quite enlightened with his presence on the day of its premiere, but the same cannot be said about Johnny Depp! Unfortunately, we all assumed his speech to include his dark humor which he constantly brings out from time to time but indeed many believe it to be a cry for help. He mentioned being in pain, being tired, and wanting to go home.


#2: Career 2016 Onwards
It is quite a well-known fact that once someone is surrounded by constant negativity, this not only takes a toll on their mental health but also starts affecting their professional life too. Depp met Amber on the sets of The Rum Diary, and both were happily married then. Depp fell into Amber‚Äôs trap, both ending their marriages and marrying each other a few years later. Depp was quite a huge hit in Hollywood. Everyone wanted to hire him. The array of films he was getting by the year was massive and all he was doing at every award function was hoarding awards. It is quite evident that following 2016, things for him took a turn downhill professionally. 

#1: Mother
Depp‚Äôs mother was quite well known for her difficult nature. Apparently, it was said Johnny was the only person who could tolerate her cruel nature. It was till her very end that he stood by her side and tended to all of her needs. If Depp could respect such a woman till her last breath, why would he ever harm someone who he claimed to have loved? There is no answer to that question by anyone but stands as a self-explanatory form of evidence to prove Depp was not the kind of man to hurt any woman, especially Amber. It seems like everyone is turning against Amber Heard. Including the actors in the movie such as Jason Momoa, Nicole Kidman, William Dafoe, etc. The Johnny Depp Amber Heard legal battle is still at the forefront of celebrity news.

snippet.title: The Double Life Of Amber Heard
snippet.description:
She Seems Sweet On Camera But This Hollywood Starlet Has Another Side To Her
Subscribe: https://goo.gl/Hnoaw3
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Celebrity breakups are a common occurrence, but the situation between Johnny Depp and his now ex-wife Amber Heard was messy to say the least. There have been some heavy accusations, and Amber was quick to label her ex ‚ÄúMr. Monster.‚Äù But was using her divorce settlement to make a huge charity donation really a noble act or is this star not what she appears to be? We‚Äôll talk about the true story of this couple who met on the set of The Rum Diary and seemed to be head over heels in love. In addition to the defamation lawsuit, she‚Äôs also gone to court over the movie London Fields and the surprising charge of. . .dog smuggling? New evidence has emerged in the form of a 911 call but instead of answering our many questions it‚Äôs just raised more of them since each celeb insists it corroborates their side of the story. Johnny Depp has no shortage of support from his family and ex-partners, including fellow star Winona Ryder, who has nothing but good things to say about her former boyfriend and co-star. 

They say there are three sides to every story: each person‚Äôs perspective and the truth. What do you think is really going on here and do you think either of these celebs deserved to be cancelled due to their actions? Let us know what you think about this situation in the comment section below and don‚Äôt forget to click on the subscribe button for more videos from us here at The Talko.

snippet.description:
Does body language and the evidence prove Amber Heard is actually the worst actor in the entire world, trying to lie about Johnny Depp? Find out next.

Amber Heard is the now 34 year old Hollywood actress who played in The Rum Diary, The Ward, and how could any of us forget her smash hit I Do..Until I Don‚Äôt, and as you all know, the now 57 year old Johnny Depp is a pirate.

Amber and Johnny got married on February 3, 2015, Amber filed for divorce on May 23, 2016, and the divorce was finalized on January 13, 2017. However, both Johnny and Amber claimed spousal abuse during the divorce hearings and Depp is now suing gossip magazines for libel, slander, and defamation for perpetuating the story, which greatly negatively impact his acting career.  So we‚Äôre going to break down Amber Heard‚Äôs body language during her intense deposition, along with their recorded conversations, to find out whether these accusations against Johnny Depp appear to be true or false.

snippet.description:
Zack Snyder Speaks On Amber Heard¬¥s Ban From All DC Movies!
Zach Snyder has announced that Amber Heard isn't going to be in any future DC movies because of her controversy with her ex husband Johnny Depp. Allegedly she has faked most of the accusations against Johnny, which has cost both of them a lot of both time, money and energy.
Many did not see Amber Heard in the new trailer for "Justice League: The Snyder Cut" and they were hyper-happy about it. 

HBO Max released the newest trailer for Zack Snyder's "Justice League" on Sunday March 14, 2020, and it received a lot of praises, with many saying it was better than what was released in 2017. However, many also noticed that Heard's name wasn't in the credits and they didn't see her in the trailer, making some wonder if Heard has been removed from the movie.

snippet.title: "Amber Slept Her Way To The Top" Emilia Clarke Reveals How Amber Heard Got The Part In Aquaman!
snippet.description:
Emilia Clarke Revals Shocking News That The Only Reason Amber Heard Was In Aquaman Is Because She Slept With...

‚úÖ Subscribe & HIT that notification bell for more Celebrity Content!

Ever since the Johnny Depp and Amber Heard scandal began, fans have been taking sides and choosing who they want to support in the legal battles. At first, everyone was on Ambers side, supporting her story but now it seems the tables have turned.

Fans of Johnny have started a change.org petition to have Amber Heard removed from her role as Mera in Aquaman 2 and over 1.8 million people have signed the petition and the number just keeps rising! snippet.title: Judge ENDS Amber Heard - Johnny Depp Amber Heard Lawsuit UPDATE
snippet.description:
After a whirlwind of romance since their first movie together, many fans thought that the marriage between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard would be lovely, unproblematic, and just full of sweetness and happiness --just like any other normal couple. But as it turned out, it was actually the opposite. Just a year after their private wedding ceremony, problems started spiraling in, and now, their divorce and lawsuits are even more excruciating and longer than the marriage itself. But how exactly did this happen? Well, let‚Äôs first go back to where the Johnny Depp - Amber Heard story started in the first place. 

Johnny and Amber first ignited a spark between them when they starred together in the 2011 comedy-drama film, The Rum Diary. Johnny portrayed a journalist who was immediately smitten with Amber‚Äôs character. However, this love story between the two quickly travelled from screen to real life. Amber Heard even told Vogue quickly after the release of the film that, ‚ÄúWorking with Johnny was amazing. It was better than I ever imagined, which is really saying something.‚Äù Technically, hearing these words from the actress already hinted that the two really hit it off easily during their film taping, and even though the two of them did not quickly jump into a relationship right after the film shooting, the same year that the film was released, the relationships they both were in at the time fell apart, and that suggested quite a rare coincidence. Depp was with his then-partner Vanessa Paradis whom he lived with for 14 years and whom he had two kids with, while Heard was with her then-girlfriend Tasya van Ree. After the film, and the rumors circulating about Johnny and Amber‚Äôs involvement with each other, Johnny and Vanessa‚Äôs relationship ended, while Amber ended things too with Tasya van Ree. Then, in 2012, the two officially started dating. The couple showed everyone that they were deeply in love with each other. But now, their relationship has turned out to be one of the messiest in history, considering their year-long marriage. 

In 2014, after a couple of years dating each other, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard announced their engagement. Amber was spotted wearing an engagement ring, which quickly sparked rumors about an upcoming wedding between the couple. This rumored engagement did not stay secret long enough, as Johnny himself confirmed this in an interview after discussing wedding planning and pointing out that he was wearing "a chick's ring" on his finger. In 2015, after several years of dating, Johnny married Amber in a private ceremony in their home in LA. Johnny Depp is no amateur star, and neither is Amber Heard. So this wedding did not stay secret for too long. The marriage started how everyone expected it would be --near perfect and rich with love. They were both wealthy personalities after all. But there‚Äôs a saying that goes around that says, ‚Äúyou shouldn‚Äôt really believe everything you see on picture.‚Äù 

In 2017, the couple was officially divorced, but the war they were fighting was definitely far from over. In 2018, Amber wrote an op-ed to The Washington Post entitled ‚ÄúI spoke up ‚Äì and faced our culture's wrath. That has to change,‚Äù where she explained that she was hurt, and in which she spoke about the treatment of women in these types of cases. Despite not involving Johnny‚Äôs name on her statement, Johnny‚Äôs team felt that it was pertained to him, having recently filed a complaint against him and, well, technically they just got out of their failed relationship. So, in March of 2019, the 57 year old actor took action and filed a lawsuit of $50 million against her, for defamation over the said article in the Washington Post. The suit said that Amber "is not a victim of domestic abuse, she is a perpetrator," and denied that Johnny ever abused her. At the time, Depp's lawyer called the article an "abuse of the #MeToo movement" and claimed Heard "masquerades as victim rather than abuser." And instead, the suit said that her allegations were part of an "elaborate hoax to generate positive publicity" for the actress. Johnny also testified that he was actually the one being hurt by his wife before, which was proven through recorded phone calls. Johnny also brought up Amber‚Äôs alleged cheating acts and affairs with actor James Franco and multi-billionaire Elon Musk. 

If you enjoyed this story, make sure to like, subscribe, and hit that notification bell for more videos like this. Stay tuned!

Related videos:
Amber Heard LOSES Case After All Witnesses Take Johnny Depp's Side!!! (Amber's LIES EXPOSED)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AKSQk1KayeA

Amber Heard & Johnny Depp: The Real ABUSER FINALLY REVEALED!! (UNCENSORED AUDIO!)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aca0KWoHtqQ

snippet.title: Amber Heard Responds To Losing ALL Movie Roles...
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Responds To Losing ALL Movie Roles...
When it comes to being a person in Hollywood, you always want to go and get that "dream role" that can elevate you to new heights. But, ask any major actor and they'll tell you that it's not just important to get that dream role, but to KEEP getting those kinds of roles as they'll prove just how good you are and show your range as an actor. For Amber Heard, she's had that "dream role" via Mera in Aquaman, but in terms of proving herself in other films...not as much. And apparently a new indie film she's in isn't doing her any favors. We'll break it down for you.

Click HERE To Enter The GIVEAWAY! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbiT0LUIbQj6CQScvWHJeKQ?sub_confirmation=1

And there you have it, everyone! A look at Amber Heard in Gully and how things aren't exactly going well for the actress. Do you feel happy knowing that she's not getting a lot of film love given all that's going on with her court case? Do you think that if Aquaman 2 goes well that she'll be able to elevate herself once again? Or do you think that she is slowly unraveling in Hollywood? Let us know in the comments below, be sure to subscribe and we'll see you next time on the channel!

snippet.description:
"AMBER'S SHOCKED" AMBER HEARD JUST LOST IN COURT - ADMITS Johnny Depp WAS RIGHT | Celebrity Craze

Amber Heard remains at the frontline of celebrity news due to his ongoing legal battles with ex husband Johnny Depp. The Johnny Depp Amber Heard court case has gotten ugly for many reasons.

While some celebrities prefer living a quiet life away from the public, others just have so many scandals following them. In this video, we are going to talk about Johnny Depp and Amber Heard, who have been on each other‚Äôs throats ever since they split up and how Amber Heard might be facing jail time for one mistake she made in all this.

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court. 

Ever since the recent release of the footage of the LAPD officers from the penthouse night of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, things have not been looking all too bright for Amber Heard. Her team has been working tirelessly in order to back up her side, however Johnny Depp seems to have made the attempt to strike back.

snippet.title: Body Cam Footage PROVING Amber  Heard LIED about Johnny Depp!
snippet.description:
Never-before-seen bodycam footage obtained by DailyMail.com shows a tidy apartment at Amber Heard and Johnny Depp's apartment in 2016

Depp says this 'proves' Heard is lying about the blowout fight that ended their toxic 18-month marriage

Heard has given evidence in multiple legal cases saying Depp hurled a phone at her face and trashed their penthouse kitchen during the May 2016 dust-up

Four different LAPD officers visited the stylish, loft-style apartment in downtown Los Angeles within the space of two hours¬†

The first two cops have given new depositions reiterating that they swept the $1.5million property but didn't see any injuries, vandalism or evidence of a crime

The other cops don't appear to spot anything suspicious in the footage and there are no obvious signs of damage, disarray or staining to the floors or carpets

'Amber and her friends described a chaotic, messy crime scene but the newly released LAPD bodycam unambiguously show that the penthouse was utterly undamaged and that their testimony was one more grandiose lie,' Depp's lawyer tells DailyMail.com

snippet.title: The Rich Lifestyle of Amber Heard 2020
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Lifestyle
Amber Laura Heard was born on April 22, 1986 in Texas. She is an American actress  with a visage that seemed tailor-made for modeling , and indeed, she began her ascent to fame on that route. Amber is best- known for her appearances in stoner comedy Pineapple Express , DC superhero film Aquaman and most recent, her contentious divorce with Hollywood actor Johnny Depp.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

The Downfall Of Amber Heard: LAPD Footage That Exposed Her

https://youtu.be/U8kIY_JREHk

Related videos:

Amber Heard Officially Charged With Perjury & Faces 4 Years In Prison

https://youtu.be/IqJ7xx-RY1E

Amber Heard Facing 10 Years In Prison For Fake Johnny Depp Accusations!?

https://youtu.be/tybOcw3gQzc

Amber Heard Faces 10 Years In Prison For Accusations Against Johnny Depp!!!

https://youtu.be/UvsHWTGHmts

Amber Heard and Johnny Depp have been involved in major legal battles for years now and
it seems that this drama is coming to an end now with new revelations and plot twists. It is
not easy to keep up with Johnny and Amber's case but what is most important here is that
Amber Heard is potentially facing jail time.
The court drama made a major plot twist when Johnny Depp filed a defamation lawsuit
against his ex-wife. He not only claimed that she lied in court, but also that she was abusive
toward him. However, the actors will need to wait even longer to get an official court ruling. If
the court rules in Johnny Depp‚Äôs favor, Amber Heard could be facing up to three years of jail
time.
Basically, Amber Heard claimed that Johnny Depp had physically and emotionally abused
her. Their original court drama in 2015 resulted in a restraining order against Johnny Depp,
but that‚Äôs also where the blurry lines began. Johnny claims that Amber had faked her black
eye seen at the court, and Amber Heard‚Äôs stylist corroborated this.
She stated, ‚ÄúThroughout the day of December 16, 2015, I could see clearly that Amber
Heard did not have any visible marks, bruises, cuts, or injuries to her face or any other part
of her body.‚Äù
But this was not the only time Amber Heard lied and was caught lying. Why would she do
that all the time? It was her strategy. She wanted to play a victim and she was good at it until
the truth came out. Even in 2017 she still managed to convince everyone that in this
situation she suffered from Johnny Depp's actions against her. Amber Heard made people
trust her and, moreover, she almost ruined Johnny Depp‚Äôs career, as the publicity called him
a ‚Äòwife beater‚Äô and supported Amber and sympathized with her.
While nothing could be proven, Amber Heard‚Äôs accusations against Johnny Depp were
enough to significantly damage Johnny‚Äôs reputation and acting career. The story also almost
derailed the latest Pirates of the Caribbean movie, Dead Men Tell No Tales, Johnny Depp
has faced significant levels of hate and ostracizing over the past five years. But then things
have changed.
The first thing which ruined Amber Heard's vicious plan was the leaked audio. And since the
audio leak, the internet has already returned to Johnny Depp's side of the issue. Johnny
Depp filed a defamation lawsuit against his ex-wife just over a year ago, and Amber Heard
attempted to get the case dismissed but her request was denied.
Johnny Depp initially filed the suit to sue Amber Heard for $50 million. But now it appears
that she could not only be forced to pay the sum, but she could also be facing jail time.
According to the International Business Times:
‚ÄúIf Heard will be proven guilty of faking her bruises, she could face three years of
imprisonment. According to the Wallin & Klarich Law Firm, the California Penal Code Section
141 PC stated that it is illegal to alter, modify, plant, place, conceal, manufacture or move
any physical matter with the intention of causing someone to be charged with a crime. Some
would face felony charges for this‚Äù.
But it doesn‚Äôt stop there. Amber Heard could also be charged with offering false evidence.
These are also considered felony crimes and each carry a maximum sentence of up to three
years.
And again, it doesn‚Äôt stop here. More and more evidence has come forward to showcase
that Amber Heard was the one who abused Johnny Depp and that she had a strategy of
making people think she was innocent. The number of times Amber lied is impressive: she
was caught lying in court (the audio recording situation), she asked or even forced people to
lie for her in court and she stole her assistant‚Äôs s*xual assault story and used it as her own.
Later it turned out that Amber Heard has a history of violence.
...
And now I want to know your opinion about this situation. Do you think Amber Heard is
facing jail time? And what‚Äôs gonna happen with Johnny Depp‚Äôs career? Let me know your
opinion in the comments section down below.

snippet.title: Elon Musk Speaks Against Amber Heard  and DEFENDS Johnny Depp
snippet.description:
Elon Musk Speaks Against Amber Heard  and DEFENDS Johnny Depp

In yet another twist, a concierge has claimed via written witness statement in court that Tesla and SpaceX CEO Elon Musk regularly visited Amber Heard at her ex-husband and Hollywood actor Johnny Depp's Los Angeles penthouse while they were still together, the media reported. A written statement from Alejandro Romero, a concierge at the building Depp and Heard were living in, alleged that the Tesla founder "frequently visited the 'Aquaman' star late at night whenever Depp wasn't home."

Because of these reports, Elon Musk has spoken up about this issue and speaks against his ex-partner Amber Heard and somehow defended Johnny Depp. If you are curious about his claims, be sure to watch the whole video because it‚Äôs pretty crazy! In addition, do us a favor and like the video and subscribe and turn on the notification bell. We‚Äôll see you in the next video!

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court.

snippet.title: Amber Heard's Friends Choose Johnny Depp‚Äôs Side After This‚Ä¶
snippet.description:
Amber Heard's Friends Choose Johnny Depp‚Äôs Side After This‚Ä¶

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶

https://youtu.be/dJe8bl_BLDE

Related videos:

Amber Heard Friends Testify AGAINST Her & Side With Johnny Depp

https://youtu.be/IfZzdVZrPuI

Amber Heard‚Äôs Lawyer QUITS & EXPOSES Amber For Ruining Johnny Depp!?

https://youtu.be/nEyBc2Ie2MU

Body Language Analyst REACTS to Amber Heard's CRINGE Deposition | Faces Episode 15

https://youtu.be/hQFFm_X2lps

Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been battling in court over the validity of
her accusations of domestic violence. However, this story took an even juicier
side when Amber Heard's friends started supporting Johnny Depp and testifying
against Amber Heard.
Make sure you stay till the end to see which Amber Heard‚Äôs friends sided with
Johnny Depp and what they have to say about Amber.
Despite the fact that Amber Heard‚Äôs vicious plan to ruin Johnny Depp‚Äôs career
was pretty successful lately, it seems like right now the tables have turned. As
you may already know, there have been several times when Amber Heard was
caught lying or using other people to stay in the driver's seat in this case. She
allegedly bribed her own sister, and used her assistant‚Äôs s*xual assault story.
Basically, things got very dirty and it seems like her fans, friends and some
other people don‚Äôt want to be linked to the perfect liar.
So, let‚Äôs start with Twitter and some fans‚Äô thoughts on Amber Heard‚Äôs lies.
When Amber Heard said it out loud that Johnny Depp was an ab*ser and even
showed bruises, fans couldn‚Äôt help but bombarded Amber with tweets and
comments. Among the Twitter users was Adam Waldman - a former member of
Johnny's legal team - who tweeted a picture of the actress as he tried to discount
her allegations against her ex-husband.
Alongside the images he wrote: ‚Äú12/15/15 allegation 'I had bruised ribs. Bruises
all over my body, bruises on my forearms from trying to defend the blows. I had
2 black eyes. I had a broken nose. I had a broken lip. Justice Nichols - I believe
her. UK Appeals Court - we believe him. But oops ... PHOTO SHOOT!‚Äù
Responding to the post, the actress said: ‚ÄúYes Mr Waldman, I may be wearing
makeup on this occasion but on every occasion you will still be short.‚Äù
Then another Twitter user commented, ‚ÄúI'd rather be short than an abusive gold
digger Woman shrugging‚Äù, Amber hit back, ‚ÄúIt's good to be realistic with your
goals‚Äù. Then, there was another tweet, written in Spanish that read, ‚ÄúAmber
Heard talking to Johnny Deep's lawyer regarding a set of photos where she
claims she was made wearing makeup to cover hit marks, a broken nostril,

bruises and more made by Johnny...but...‚Äù, the actress replied, ‚ÄúAnd so?‚Äù Looks
like Amber Heard is having fun and doesn't care what people say about her.
Amber Heard could expect such a reaction from people and, probably, that is
why she is so calm and confident. But what she did not expect was that her
friends sided with Johnny Depp. You have to wonder who and why betrayed
Amber Heard, and we are going to break it down for you in a minute.
Amber Heard was shocked when Laura Divenere (interior decorator to the stars)
and Amber‚Äôs former friend testified against her. Laura Divenere worked for
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard as their interior decorator in downtown LA in
the Eastern Columbia Building from July 2014 to sometime in 2016. And after
the pair splitted up Laura continued to work for Amber. She explains, "I have
been and continue to consider myself a friend of Amber's. I remain in regular
contact with Amber. I have not communicated with Mr. Depp since 2016." It is
an interesting ally in this case for Johnny Depp as she is the first person in the
case to identify as a friend of Amber Heard's but give testimony in support of
Johnny.

Plus I want to know your opinion about Amber Heard‚Äôs friends taking Johnny
Depp‚Äôs side. Do you think they just don‚Äôt want to be linked to Amber Heard
because she is a liar? Let me know your opinion in the comments section down
below. Thanks for watching this video and don‚Äôt forget to hit that subscribe
button.

snippet.title: Linguist Analyzes Amber Heard‚Äôs Unreliable Statements About Johnny Depp
snippet.description:
Statement & Conversation Analysis of Amber Heard‚Äôs words in a 2016 deposition. This analysis focuses on Heard‚Äôs statements about her and Depp‚Äôs relationship. Want to help support this channel? 1) Thumbs up & Subscribe. 2) Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/martindecoder

Your support on Patreon is much appreciated for the time-consuming task it is to make these analyses. Thank you for supporting for whatever amount of time you‚Äôre able to.

I‚Äôm a Danish linguist, educated in Statement Analysis (SA) & Conversation Analysis (CA). In these methods, it‚Äôs understood that people subconsciously want to tell the truth, which is why the truth is revealed in their language use.

Literature that I use in my job as external lecturer and that I recommend, if you want to know more about Conversation Analysis and Narrative Analysis:

Hutchby, Ian (2006): ‚ÄòMedia Talk ‚Äì Conversation Analysis and the Study of Broadcasting‚Äô. Maidenhead: Open University Press. (Basic Principles + Conversation Analysis of News Interviews)

Rowland, Robert (2009). ‚ÄúThe narrative perspective‚Äù. Kuypers, Jim A. (ed.): ‚ÄòRhetorical criticism ‚Äì perspectives in action‚Äô. Plymouth, MA: Lexington Books, p. 117-141. (The Basics of Narrative Analysis)

This video is made according to the terms of ‚Äòfair use‚Äô.

snippet.title: "AMBER LIES AGAIN" Amber Heard ADMITS Her Baby Announcement Was A Publicity Stunt | The Gossipy
snippet.description:
"AMBER LIES AGAIN" Amber Heard ADMITS Her Baby Announcement Was A Publicity Stunt | The Gossipy

Can Amber Heard do anything out of the kindness of her own heart? I guess not. Amber Heard is clearly up to her schemes again. Even when it comes to her newborn daughter. A daughter who maybe might have Elon Musk or Johnny Depp as the father.

Johnny Depp and Amber Heard are back on the frontlines of celebrity news. Amber Heard just had a baby girl and rumors are swirling on who the baby's father is. Many are saying it is Johnny Depp. But no public statements have been made in this regard by either Johnny Depp or Amber Heard. So no one knows for sure yet. In this video, we breakdown the story in detail. This celebrity drama goes down while the Johnny Depp Amber Heard civil court case rages on.  

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court. 

Ever since the recent release of the footage of the LAPD officers from the penthouse night of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, things have not been looking all too bright for Amber Heard. Her team has been working tirelessly in order to back up her side, however Johnny Depp seems to have made the attempt to strike back.

#JohnnyIsTheFather #AmberHeard #JohnnyDepp #JusticeForJohnny

snippet.title: Celebrities CONFIRM Amber Heard Is A LIAR!
snippet.description:
For over four years now, ex couple Johnny Depp and Amber Heard are still caught in between the turmoil that their previous marriage has brought. For a marriage that ended just after a year, it is indeed quite a long and agonizing journey that the former couple took after that. Johnny and Amber have gone from obsessing over each other to hating one another in the blink of an eye, and now, their divorce has gone into a messy turn. When Johnny Depp and Amber Heard were first married, everyone thought they were very much in love, and maybe that was a fact for a short time, until the two decided to end their marriage in 2016. However, this divorce isn‚Äôt the end of the story, it is actually just the start of a tragic drama that is about to unfold. Along with the divorce, Amber filed for a restraining order against Johnny the same year, for reasons that the latter had allegedly hurt her during their marriage. This, however, was denied by Johnny countless times and the evidence supplied for this issue had also been proven to be fabricated. Not cool, Amber. But this still wasn‚Äôt the end of their fight.

Amber claimed that Johnny had been terrible with her at various points in their relationship. Because of these allegations, news publisher The Sun called Johnny a very bad name, and a term that obviously offended Johnny because he stays true to his statement that he never hurts anyone. Johnny filed a libel case against the news company but unfortunately, he lost on this one. But aside from this, another incident also ignited the feud between the former couple, when Amber Heard wrote an op-ed article in The Washington Post, where she claimed to be a victim of domestic maltreatment. The article was entitled ‚ÄúI spoke up ‚Äì and faced our culture's wrath. That has to change.‚Äù  In the op-ed, she explained that she was maltreated, and she spoke about the treatment of women in the same domestic cases. Apart from this, she also became the face of the women empowerment movement, which many fans thought was the wrong place for Amber to publicly raise her case. For starters, she never really had a legitimate proof that she was hurt by Johnny Depp, and he even had evidence against her that she was stating her facts the other way. These sets of evidence include the phone call that Johnny made with Amber, where she admitted hitting JOhnny. And the list goes on, including the alleged affairs of Amber with actor James Franco and multi-billionaire Elon Musk, and the missing donations to charity that Amber claimed she would make after her $7 million dollar divorce settlement with Johnny. Despite not involving Johnny‚Äôs name on her statement, Johnny‚Äôs team felt that it was pertaining to him, having recently filed a complaint against him and, well, technically they just got out of their failed relationship.  So, triggered by this, Johnny filed for a $50 million dollar defamation lawsuit against Amber Heard. This lawsuit is still ongoing to this day, and the latest trial will be held in court by July of 2021. However, Amber had recently tried to dismiss this case for the second time, bringing up the lost libel case with The Sun as her back up defense. But, aside from millions of fans who support Johnny on this feat, countless friends, family, former lovers, colleagues, and other celebrities have stood up to defend Johnny against his ex wife. Who are they? And what lies did Amber say that they claimed to be false? Let‚Äôs find out in this video, but first, make sure to hit that subscribe button and smash that notification bell for more updates. Let‚Äôs dive in!

1. Winona Ryder
Winona Ryder is one of Johnny Depp‚Äôs former flames, and one that really ignited fans‚Äô interest at that time. Winona and Johnny met in Tim Burton‚Äôs classic, Edward Scissorhaands, and dated for four years. 

2. Vanessa Paradis
Another celebrity and another one of Johnny‚Äôs ex flames, Vanessa Paradis also spoke up about the allegations. Johnny Depp has been involved with many actresses throughout his career, he is indeed a very handsome and career-driven man, but if there‚Äôs one woman who caught and kept his attention for a very long time, it‚Äôs Vanessa. 

3. Penelope Cruz
Perhaps in terms of a case of physical maltreatment against a woman, it is important to look at who defends who. In Johnny‚Äôs case, there are more women supporting and believing he is innocent than the women who take Amber‚Äôs side.

That‚Äôs all for today, we hope you enjoyed that video, and if you did, don‚Äôt forget to hit that like and subscribe button and smash that notification bell for more videos like this. Stay tuned!

Heard accidentally OWNS herself, PROVING Depp was RIGHT! LOL!

snippet.title: Judge STOPS LISTENING To Amber Heard! - Johnny Depp Amber Heard Lawsuit!
snippet.description:
From a sweep-you-off-your-feet kind of romance, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard‚Äôs love story has taken a messy turn in just a few years. It seemed like the couple‚Äôs burning desire for each other turned into a burning dislike as quickly as it started. Five years after Amber Heard filed for divorce, the fight between the former couple is still ongoing. And even though the divorce had been finalized four years ago, the chaos that their marriage brought is far from over. But since the latest court hearing for the former couple‚Äôs defamation lawsuit will take place soon, there have been many major changes and happenings that just surfaced, and that includes a huge win for Johnny‚Äôs case. It seems like the Virginian judge handling their case is tired of Amber‚Äôs lies and is not willing to listen to her anymore. How did that happen? Well, it is a pretty detailed case but in this video, we‚Äôll lay out everything you need to know. But before that, make sure to smash that subscribe button first and hit that notification bell for more updates. Let‚Äôs dive in!

Before everything else, let‚Äôs go back to the beginning of this case. Johnny and Amber first ignited a spark between them when they starred together at the 2011 comedy-drama film, The Rum Diary. This love story between the two had quickly travelled from screen to real life. Johnny was then sharing his life with partner Vanessa Paradis, a French actress and singer, whom he lived with for 14 years and whom he had two kids with, while Amber was with her then girlfriend Tasya van Ree. Shortly after the film‚Äôs release, the two broke off their current relationships and officially started dating. Their relationship was something you can describe as romantic and utterly beautiful. But today, it‚Äôs now one of the messiest in history. Amber Heard filed for divorce in 2016. Along the divorce filing was her request for a temporary restraining order against Johnny, accusing him of physically hurting her. Johnny, up to this day, vehemently denies the allegation. Even though the couple‚Äôs divorce was finalized in 2017, lawsuits have been made due to Amber‚Äôs concerning allegations against Depp. She also alleged that at the time of her filing for divorce, Johnny threw a phone at her which caused her to bruise her face, an accusation that Johnny denied, and investigators found false. Turns out, the photos were staged. Not so cool, Amber. Aside from this, the Aquaman actress also stressed that Johnny was hurtful towards his former lovers, which Johnny‚Äôs ex-wife and ex-fiancee proved false.

But despite the police‚Äôs information, news publication The Sun still called Johnny Depp a very bad name which angered the actor, causing him to file a libel lawsuit against the publication. Sadly enough, Johnny lost this lawsuit, which resulted in his career‚Äôs downfall as major production company Warner Bros. fired him from his role as Grindelwald in the upcoming third installment of the series Fantastic Beasts. Clearly, this broke Johnny‚Äôs heart. 

But even though her name became pretty big during this case, it is undeniable that Johnny‚Äôs name in the industry is a lot bigger. So, Amber started to lose her supporters‚Äô trust, especially when more and more evidence against her was turning up, including the phone calls she made with Johnny admitting that she did hit him, her alleged affairs, and even her false claims that she donated her $7 million dollar divorce settlement to charity. Until now, Amber couldn‚Äôt provide any proof that she did donate her settlement money, which she publicly promised before. 

You might be wondering why Johnny Depp filed for a lawsuit in the state of Virginia when neither him nor Amber lives in the state. Virginia is one of just ten states that adhere to what‚Äôs known as the lex loci delicti rule, which is Latin for place of the wrong where the tort was committed. That‚Äôs defined as where the publication occurs. The Washington Post‚Äôs servers, the publication in which Amber released her Op Ed, are located in the state. Another reason why Johnny did not file his lawsuit in California is because of its strong Anti-SLAPP statute. Now, what is an anti-SLAPP law? These laws are intended to prevent people from using lawsuits, such as defamation suits, to intimidate people who are exercising their First Amendment rights. 

That‚Äôs all for today, hope you enjoyed that video and we‚Äôll see you on the next. Don‚Äôt forget to like and subscribe, and hit that notification bell for more videos like this.

Related videos:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Rcd2szVwVWg

Heard PANICS as her INNER CIRCLE CRACKS! Her WITNESSES WANT OUT?!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jVhcTpADKbU&t=119s

Until now, Amber couldn‚Äôt provide any proof that she did donate her settlement money, which she publicly promised before. 

You might be wondering why Johnny Depp filed for a lawsuit in the state of Virginia when neither him nor Amber lives in the state. Virginia is one of just ten states that adhere to what‚Äôs known as the lex loci delicti rule, which is Latin for place of the wrong where the tort was committed. That‚Äôs defined as where the publication occurs. The Washington Post‚Äôs servers, the publication in which Amber released her Op Ed, are located in the state. Another reason why Johnny did not file his lawsuit in California is because of its strong Anti-SLAPP statute. Now, what is an anti-SLAPP law? These laws are intended to prevent people from using lawsuits, such as defamation suits, to intimidate people who are exercising their First Amendment rights. 

That‚Äôs all for today, hope you enjoyed that video and we‚Äôll see you on the next. Don‚Äôt forget to like and subscribe, and hit that notification bell for more videos like this.

snippet.title: What Happened To Amber Heard?
snippet.description:
This Is The Rise And Fall Of Amber Heard
Subscribe: http://bit.ly/Subscribe-to-Talko
--------------------------------------------------------------------

There was a time when Amber Heard was known for her work as an actress and activist, but that was before her marriage and divorce from Johnny Depp. How did all of this take place? We‚Äôll take a look back at the true story of this star and see how she went from her childhood home in Texas to her career history in New York City. Long before her ex-husband promised her ‚Äúglobal humiliation,‚Äù they were falling in love on the set of ‚ÄúThe Rum Diaries,‚Äù but right from the beginning there were accusations of infidelity, some of which involved Elon Musk! Amber was once a contestant in beauty pageants, but dropped out of high school to pursue her career. But this isn‚Äôt the first time she‚Äôs had bad press with a partner; most fans have forgotten about an altercation between her and her then-girlfriend, Tasya van Ree. This also isn‚Äôt her first lawsuit, as things got unpleasant on the set of the film ‚ÄúLondon Fields.‚Äù It seems like everyone is turning against her, while her ex has support from his family and his other exes including Winona Ryder. 

What do you think about this situation? Has it impacted the way you view this actress‚Äô past projects? snippet.title: How Amber Heard Destroyed Her Own Career
snippet.description:
How Amber Heard Destroyed Her Own Career

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶

https://youtu.be/dJe8bl_BLDE

Related videos:

How Amber Heard Destroyed Her Own Career

https://youtu.be/-qHw0PtrdQI

Amber Heard‚Äôs Lawyer EXPOSES Her For Ruining Johnny Depp

https://youtu.be/pZR2_v4UpgI

Amber Heard Officially FIRED From Aquaman 2 Role! (REACTIONS)

https://youtu.be/QBCEXSVjBrM

Amber Heard was extremely successful after divorcing Johnny Depp: she got cast in the
biggest movie franchise of her career - DC's 'Aquaman' - became the spokesperson of
cosmetics giant L'Or√©al Paris, as well as American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) ambassador
for women's rights with a focus on gender-based violence.
So many people even claimed they have never heard about Amber until this infamous
divorce: ‚ÄúHad no idea who she was until that divorce. I didn‚Äôt even know that it was her who
played Mara!‚Äù - one fan said.
However, the tables have turned and now Amber Heard is finding that her career as an A-list
Hollywood actress might be over. She has reportedly been kicked from Aquaman 2 and she
is about to lose the contract with L'oreal Paris.
So what was the reason for all of these problematic events for Amber Heard? Apparently,
her well-planned strategy to ruin Johnny Depp‚Äôs life has been shattered. And now no one
believes that Amber is an innocent victim as Johnny showed in a court undeniable evidence
of Amber being an abuser (audio, text messages and so on).
Heard lost the appeal to dismiss Johnny Depp‚Äôs $50 million defamation lawsuit and we
learned that the Aquaman star could be facing up to 3 years of jail time if found guilty of
manipulating evidence against her then-husband. But even beyond the former couple‚Äôs
seemingly never-ending legal battle, Heard has come under a lot of fire after evidence
presented to the court as part of the lawsuit revealed that she‚Äôs physically and emotionally
harassed Depp while twisting the narrative in her favor and painting the Pirates of the
Caribbean actor as a domestic abuser.
In fact, the petition to remove her from Aquaman 2 recently reached a whopping 400,000
signatures and is on its way to passing the half-million threshold. This is essentially the same
kind of backlash and blacklisting that Depp had to endure a couple of years ago, so you can
see why fans of the legendary star are asking for justice with such fervency. And now,
according to a new report by Cosmic Book News, Warner Bros. has gone forward with firing
Heard from Aquaman 2 by buying out her contract.
Also there was one more petition against Amber Heard. ‚ÄúA liar and an abuser, a shame for
women,‚Äù begins one of two Change.org campaigns to remove Amber Heard, 33, from her
role as global spokesperson for cosmetics brand L‚ÄôOr√©al.
And yet, she has claimed in her court declaration countering ex-husband's $50 million
defamation suit against her that her career took a serious hit and she received death threats
that forced her to constantly keep on changing her contact details.
Here is what Amber declared in her motion to dismiss Johnny Depp‚Äôs lawsuit filed in Fairfax
County, Virginia Circuit Court:
"Following my highly-publicized separation from Johnny, I read accounts in the media
referring to me as a victim of domestic violence. In response, many people called me a liar

(without ever hearing my story). I was dropped from a global fashion brand's upcoming
campaign. I lost a part of a movie in which I had already been cast. People I have never met
or spoken to threatened me with violence. I received so many death threats I had to change
my phone number on a near-weekly basis.‚Äù
Isn‚Äôt it fair that her career might be over with Johnny as it started with him?
As reported by MEAWW earlier, although Heard's career in the entertainment industry began
in 2003 when she appeared in two music videos - Kenny Chesney's 'There Goes My Life'
and Eisley's 'I Wasn't Prepared," and went onto star in an array of TV shows and movies, her
career really took off in 2015 ‚Äî the same year when she married Depp ‚Äî when she had
prominent roles in four mainstream movies.


Now I want to know your opinion. Do you think Amber Heard‚Äôs career will be over soon as
she destroyed it on her own? Let me know what you think in the comments section down
below.

Binge Watch - Binge Watch is the best source of the latest celebrity news. Want to see what's trending today in the Hollywood life or hear about the newest celeb gossip? You're in the right place. 

Consider subscribing to not miss out on what's trending today in the life of the world's biggest stars.

Isn‚Äôt it fair that her career might be over with Johnny as it started with him?
As reported by MEAWW earlier, although Heard's career in the entertainment industry began
in 2003 when she appeared in two music videos - Kenny Chesney's 'There Goes My Life'
and Eisley's 'I Wasn't Prepared," and went onto star in an array of TV shows and movies, her
career really took off in 2015 ‚Äî the same year when she married Depp ‚Äî when she had
prominent roles in four mainstream movies.


Now I want to know your opinion. Do you think Amber Heard‚Äôs career will be over soon as
she destroyed it on her own? Let me know what you think in the comments section down
below.

snippet.title: AMBER HEARD CLAPS BACK As She REACTS TO THE HORRIBLE Reviews For Her New Movie | The Gossipy
snippet.description:
AMBER HEARD CLAPS BACK As She REACTS TO THE HORRIBLE Reviews For Her New Movie | The Gossipy

Amber Heard knows how to get that money. She remains in the celebrity news and headlines as Aquaman 2 is set to make Amber Heard one of the highest paid actresses in Hollywood today. The Johnny Depp Amber Heard Court case continues and remains at the top of celeb news. 

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court. 

Ever since the recent release of the footage of the LAPD officers from the penthouse night of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, things have not been looking all too bright for Amber Heard. Her team has been working tirelessly in order to back up her side, however Johnny Depp seems to have made the attempt to strike back.

#Aquaman2 #AmberHeard #JohnnyDepp #JusticeForJohnny

snippet.title: Johnny Depp snagged a victory in his court battle against ex-wife Amber Heard #Shorts
snippet.description:
Title: Charity to reveal if Amber Heard donated $7M Johnny Depp divorce settlement #Shorts

Read More Stories Here: www.haveitalldaily.com 

Description: 
Amber Heard publicly made a promise to give her $7m divorce settlement from Johnny Depp to charity but nothing was ever confirmed. Well Johnny Depp isn‚Äôt one to give up and has been granted a partial petition by a judge in New York that has ordered the American Civil Liberties Union to release documents to confirm whether Heard donated the 2017 divorce payout. 

‚ÄúMr. Depp is most gratified by the Court‚Äôs decision,‚Äù Depp‚Äôs attorney Benhamin Chew told USA Today. 

His lawyers claim that Amber was lying about donating all of her divorce settlement to ACLU and the Children‚Äôs Hospital Los Angeles and may have cost him his libel case against a British newspaper in November 2020.

His attorney Andrew Caldecott claimed that Amber‚Äôs claim of donating money to charity was ‚Äúcalculated and manipulative lie‚Äù that ‚Äútipped the scales against Mr. Depp from the very beginning.‚Äù 

Lawyers for News Group Newspapers claim, Amber had intended to pay it out over 10 years and had not lied.

snippet.title: Emilia Clarke REPLACING Amber Heard In Aquaman 2?!
snippet.description:
Although it is pretty obvious that Amber Heard should be fired from the Aquaman 2 sequel, the DC Extended Universe‚Äôs film production company that was supposed to make this decision, seems to have missed the obvious. Now, they are getting huge media backlash, thanks to the negative comments against one of their lead actresses, Amber Heard. Before the whole Aquaman 2 filming even began, we all knew, and if you didn‚Äôt then you should listen to this next fact, that millions of fans were against Amber‚Äôs role reprisal in the upcoming Aquaman second installment that stars Jason Momoa and other huge stars such as Nicole Kidman, Patrick Wilson, Willem Defoe, and Randall Park. Such a big cast ensemble, and that alone proves that Warner Bros. can pay huge stars for their roles. Now, what‚Äôs up with recasting Amber Heard? You may remember that a huge number of supporters filed for a petition to be signed with the aim to request Warner Brothers to fire Amber from her role as Queen Mera, the same way they forced Johnny to leave Fantastic Beasts. However, even after garnering more than 1.6 million signatures, Warner Brothers still pushed through, having Amber reprise her role. A lot of fans were upset by this, and we mean UPSET. Everywhere you look on social media, there were mean comments about Amber, and sadly, about the upcoming Aquaman film itself. There‚Äôs no doubt that the first Aquaman directed by James Wan was a huge hit, and it deserved every inch of success because it‚Äôs aesthetically and cinematically beautiful in many, many aspects. Yet, during the promotion period, it had been noticeable that people were planning to not watch the movie and even campaign for others to boycott it too, in honor of their support for Johnny Depp, who has been let go from his role as Grindelwald in the Fantastic Beasts film series. Both movies are set to premiere in 2022, and both movies are going to be under Warner Brothers.

But what is keeping Warner Bros. head over heels for this actress who is currently dealing with a huge lawsuit in front of her, and a number of pieces of evidence against her proving that she is not all that she claims to be? With everything that‚Äôs going on in Johnny and Amber‚Äôs post-divorce chaos, it is indeed safe to say that Amber‚Äôs name is in the hot seat, and not in a positive way. Well, it turns out they are obviously risking it. Several people are slowing turning to Johnny‚Äôs side. So, in the middle of this all, fans can‚Äôt help but make their own bets on who would be the suitable replacement for her cast as Queen Mera. There are tons of different actresses that would fit the role, but it seems like in the last few months while this situation against casting Amber is happening, fans‚Äô eyes are falling on Emilia Clarke.

But why do we think Emilia would be the perfect person to play Queen Mera? Well, there‚Äôs a number of reasons, from rekindling her romance with Game of Thrones co-star Jason Momoa. Stay tuned because we are about to enumerate all the reasons for you. But first, make sure to hit that subscribe button and smash that notification bell for more updates. So, here are some of the biggest reasons why Emilia Clarke is the best female celeb to replace Amber Heard in Aquaman 2.

1. She is one of the biggest and most celebrated female stars today
Widely known as Daenerys Targaryen, 

2. Fans would love to see Jason Momoa and Emilia Clarke back as an on screen pair
It is never easy to replace a cast member, especially a well-loved cast member, in a film‚Äôs second installment. However, if Warner Bros. did this decision as easily with Johnny Depp, considering how it might agitate his fans, then it must also be an easy feat for the production company to replace Amber Heard as well especially in the midst of her. While it is never easy with the fans (but in this case of course it is) when an actor is replaced in a franchise, it may go down better with viewers when they see Jason and Emilia reunite as an on-screen pair. The biggest reason why Emilia Clarke is a good replacement for Amber Heard in ‚ÄòAquaman 2‚Äô is that she is a fan-favorite since her past role with Jason Momoa.

3. Emilia‚Äôs siren-like physique can surely rock the Queen Mera suit
Amidst this chaos between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard, fans are already eyeing Emilia Clarke as the latter‚Äôs replacement in Aquaman 2.

But given that all these will remain merely fantasies for fans, we‚Äôll just wait for 2022 and see how Aquaman 2 goes. That‚Äôs all for today, we hope you enjoyed that video, and if you did, make sure you like, subscribe, and hit that notification bell for more videos like this.

While it is never easy with the fans (but in this case of course it is) when an actor is replaced in a franchise, it may go down better with viewers when they see Jason and Emilia reunite as an on-screen pair. The biggest reason why Emilia Clarke is a good replacement for Amber Heard in ‚ÄòAquaman 2‚Äô is that she is a fan-favorite since her past role with Jason Momoa.

3. Emilia‚Äôs siren-like physique can surely rock the Queen Mera suit
Amidst this chaos between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard, fans are already eyeing Emilia Clarke as the latter‚Äôs replacement in Aquaman 2.

But given that all these will remain merely fantasies for fans, we‚Äôll just wait for 2022 and see how Aquaman 2 goes. That‚Äôs all for today, we hope you enjoyed that video, and if you did, make sure you like, subscribe, and hit that notification bell for more videos like this.

Heard allegedly did all of these things. I think many of us agree she wanted to hurt Depp. 

Disclaimer: All of my videos from here and in the future are all alleged. I am not trying to defame anyone.

snippet.title: "FIRE AMBER" Warner Brothers Wants To FIRE Amber Heard From Aquaman 2 NOW | The Gossipy
snippet.description:
"FIRE AMBER" Warner Brothers Wants To FIRE Amber Heard From Aquaman 2 NOW | The Gossipy

Did Amber Heard just get booted for Aquaman 2? This would be great news to Johnny Depp and Aquaman fans around the world. The #FireAmberHeard movement is going strong. It seems the Aquaman 2 director, James Wan, does not even want Amber Heard in the movie. 

It seems like everyone is turning against Amber Heard. The Johnny Depp Amber Heard legal battle is still at the forefront of celebrity news. 

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court. 

Ever since the recent release of the footage of the LAPD officers from the penthouse night of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, things have not been looking all too bright for Amber Heard. Her team has been working tirelessly in order to back up her side, however Johnny Depp seems to have made the attempt to strike back.

snippet.title: Johnny Depp Wants Proof That Amber Heard's Divorce Settlement Was Donated
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp continues to claim that his ex-wife Amber Heard has not donated her $7 million divorce settlement to charity.  After the exes‚Äô finalized their split, Amber pledged to donate the entire settlement and split it between two charities, the ACLU and Children‚Äôs Hospital of Los Angeles. Now, the ‚ÄúPirates of the Caribbean‚Äù actor and his lawyer have filed papers asking both organizations to share how much Amber has donated. In the court papers Johnny quote ‚Äúrespectfully requests that this Court enter an order directing the ACLU Witnesses to fully comply with the Subpoenas." Amber‚Äôs legal team insist that the ‚ÄúAquaman‚Äù actress has done ‚Äúnothing dishonest‚Äù with her donations and that she ‚Äúpledged to pay over 10 years." They also said she has been ‚Äúdelayed in that goal‚Äù because she‚Äôs ‚Äúbeen forced to spend millions of dollars defending‚Äù herself amid Depp‚Äôs multiple lawsuits.

Now, this matter has been brought forward from April 11, 2020, Amber Heard has apparently requested for the hearing which is to be held on the 28th of May, in front of Penney Azcarate. He was assigned the case by Chief judge Bruce White.

As Amber Heard was unsuccessful in shutting Johnny‚Äôs Depp‚Äôs suit in the past, this time she is trying to see far ahead with the new strategy. At the moment, Heard has nothing to lose and help her gain a sure-footed move in the US .

In this case, both the cases were different, one was defamation and the other was a case. The main difference between the two is that of the written word and of the spoken word. One of the new pieces of evidence that were revealed later is the Bodycam footage from the cops that Amber Heard had called on Johnny Depp. This bodycam is from the rampage that occurred in May 2016. In the , many of Amber Heard‚Äôs allies and friends have given evidence from the incident. 

They said that Johnny Depp hurled a phone at her face and had also thrashed the penthouse‚Äôs kitchen. What Amber Heard‚Äôs have claimed to be depictions of the damage done by Johnny Depp are quite different from what the police had observed and addressed.

Amber Heard‚Äôs friends had dialed 9-1-1 mistakenly twice, the first cops to arrive have given some new depositions since the last month, claiming that they had seen no signs of vandalism, injuries, or crime scene. 

Johnny Depp‚Äôs attorney addressed this cover-up and countered Amber Heard‚Äôs allegation the night of the rampage, a chaotic, messy crime had been reported by Amber Heard and her allies although the LAPD‚Äôs bodycam proved the testimony wrong, he had stated. 

This leads us to another point which is that Amber Heard has made a lot of cover-ups. The rampage night was not the only cover-up by Amber Heard, she has exaggerated and on many occasions made false claims. 

The bodycam is the lead that tells us that Amber Heard has been provided by her team with all the stories.The UK case can be noted as having a few flawed logic in the verdict, the appeal had been denied partly, the reason being that Johnny‚Äôs team failed to present the evidence early. 

This incident has always been highlighted by Amber Heard and she has voiced her views on the same, saying that Johnny Depp was in a rage, beat her, and tore the house apart. When the police arrived, she didn‚Äôt look like she was assaulted nor did the house look ‚Äòtorn apart.
