snippet.title: Judge LOSES IT After Amber Heard Tries to Get Case Dismissed For the THIRD TIME!
snippet.description:
Just when fans thought Amber Heard would finally stop all her unexpected stunts to try and get away with her wrongdoings during her marriage with legendary star Johnny Depp, she sinks even lower just recently, after trying to have her case with Johnny get dismissed again by the court, for the third time. But what did really go down over there? Are the Virginian judges actually considering this move by Amber‚Äôs legal team? Let‚Äôs find out in this video. But before anything else, make sure first to hit that subscribe button and smash that notification bell for more updates on this. So, let‚Äôs dive in! 

Being a celebrity is a tricky thing, as your personal relationships can become very public affairs. Amber Heard and Johnny Depp know this all too well, as the former couple is consistently making headlines due to their ongoing legal situation. Amber Heard and Johnny Depp have been duking it out in court for years, and are showing no signs of slowing down. It has been an excruciatingly long time since Johnny had filed a suit against Amber Heard‚Äôs team after his former wife wrote details about their previous and failed marriage in an Op Ed article at The Washington Post, which then ended Johnny‚Äôs chances of getting back on his most famous Disney film franchise, the Pirates of the Caribbean series, and basically ruined his entire career. Even though the article was not directly mentioning Johnny‚Äôs name in it, it was obviously pertaining to him as Amber said, detailed, and explained that she was physically maltreated, and in which she spoke about the treatment of women in cases such as hers. So, in March of 2019, the 57 year old actor took action and filed a lawsuit of $50 million against her, for things said over the aforementioned article in the Washington Post. The suit said that Amber "is not a product of domestic maltreatment, she is a perpetrator," and denied that Johnny ever hurt her physically. At the time, Depp's lawyer called the article an "overuse of the women empowerment movement". And instead, the suit said that her words were part of an "elaborate stunt to generate positive publicity" for the actress. And then of course the #NeverForget $7 million dollar‚Äôs worth of divorce settlement she got from her wealthy ex husband, Johnny, which she vowed to donate to charity but who knows what really happened to it now? A Virginian judge scolded Amber Heard for quote ‚Äúwasting the court‚Äôs time‚Äù. 

But anyway, after all these, you might think she's done. But nope, it seems like the end is a long way ahead yet for Amber‚Äôs eyes. For the second time a few months ago, Amber tried to have her case with Johnny dismissed, pulling out her ‚Äúhe lost the case with The Sun card‚Äù, which was honestly a little low. Not cool, Amber. You may remember that before this lawsuit with Amber, Johnny had already fought for a lawsuit against new publisher The Sun, after the company called him a very bad name. 

 And after that, she then surprised the whole world with her own baby! It was born out of surrogate, and yes, no one knows who the father is, but it may actually be an important twist in the hearings to come. For the third time! Wow, being inside Amber Heard‚Äôs head might be tough. 

This latest update comes to us from Court House News, which revealed how the proceedings in court went down yesterday. One of Amber Heard‚Äôs lawyers attempted to use the verdict in the U.K. as an indication that she shouldn‚Äôt be hit with a lawsuit. Obviously Depp‚Äôs team has clapped back, so it remains to be seen if the third attempt for the case to be dismissed is successful. According to the CourtHouse News, ‚ÄúAn attorney for actress Amber Heard on Thursday asked a Virginia judge to embrace findings from a U.K. court that Johnny Depp, Heard's ex husband.

Johnny‚Äôs lawyers have challenged back, once again, stating that the cases cannot be connected. Depp's lawyer, Ben Chew of Brown Rudnick, characterized the motion for dismissal as futile and frivolous. However, after trying to dismiss her lawsuit one too many times, Ben Chow also called out for Amber Heard's legal team to halt before Johnny asks them to be abided by law, pushing for Heard and her team to receive consequences for their repeated claims in court. 

What upsets most fans is the fact that Amber will still star alongside Jason Momoa in the latest DCEU installment of Aquaman, despite many supporters‚Äô request for Warner Brothers to do otherwise.

What about you? Will you be watching Aquaman 2? Do you think it's fair for Johnny‚Äôs famous case to be dismissed because of the lost libel case years ago in a different continent?  See you next time!

Related videos:
Depp WINS BIG as FANTASTIC BEASTS FAILS! Warner's RUNNING SCARED!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OrK7O1ES-gs

Heard BEGS the COURT to STOP as even the MEDIA BACKS DEPP?!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3YHmbJEvn40

snippet.title: Why is Amber Heard not IN JAIL?? | Why did Johnny Depp Lose his Case? | EZ Law
snippet.description:
In 2020, Johnny Depp lost his libel case against News Group Newspapers who produce The Sun. Depp claimed The Sun's article in 2018 which claimed he was a wife-beater and had abused Amber Heard, was false. 

Many were confused when the High Court ruled against Johnny Depp, even though there was proof that Amber Heard had assaulted him. A voice recording surfaced of the pair talking and Heard admits to hitting Depp. Many called for Amber Heard to go to jail and the hashtag #justiceforjohnnydepp began trending.

However, a lot of people have misunderstood the case. Despite involving domestic abuse, this was not a criminal trial but a libel trial. This means neither Amber Heard or Johnny Depp were on trial. Johnny Depp was only suing The Sun and Amber Heard was simply a witness to help The Sun's case.

Unlike in a criminal trial where one must prove guilt 'beyond reasonable doubt', in this libel case The Sun only had to prove it was 'more likely than not' that what they had reported was true; that Depp had abused Amber Heard.

Please subscribe for more simple explanations of UK law cases! If you have any questions please leave them in the comments below.

Thank you for watching!

snippet.localized.title: Why is Amber Heard not IN JAIL?? | Why did Johnny Depp Lose his Case? | EZ Law
snippet.localized.description:
In 2020, Johnny Depp lost his libel case against News Group Newspapers who produce The Sun. Depp claimed The Sun's article in 2018 which claimed he was a wife-beater and had abused Amber Heard, was false. 

Many were confused when the High Court ruled against Johnny Depp, even though there was proof that Amber Heard had assaulted him. A voice recording surfaced of the pair talking and Heard admits to hitting Depp. Many called for Amber Heard to go to jail and the hashtag #justiceforjohnnydepp began trending.

However, a lot of people have misunderstood the case. Despite involving domestic abuse, this was not a criminal trial but a libel trial. This means neither Amber Heard or Johnny Depp were on trial. Johnny Depp was only suing The Sun and Amber Heard was simply a witness to help The Sun's case.

Unlike in a criminal trial where one must prove guilt 'beyond reasonable doubt', in this libel case The Sun only had to prove it was 'more likely than not' that what they had reported was true; that Depp had abused Amber Heard.

Please subscribe for more simple explanations of UK law cases! If you have any questions please leave them in the comments below.

Thank you for watching!

snippet.title: Johnny Depp Reacts To Amber Heard Being In Aquaman 2
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp Reacts To Amber Heard Being In Aquaman 2

Amber Heard has been giving a sneak peek of her prep for Aquaman 2 for a while now. The actress has been intensively training for her revival as Mera.
She‚Äôs gotten back on sets today for the shoot but the news hasn‚Äôt gone down well with Johnny Depp and his fans. However, Twitter is witnessing #JusticeForJohnnyDepp trending with over 10K tweets in a few minutes after her revival was announced.

Johnny Depp's fans are trending #JusticeforJohnnyDepp as they are expressing anger over the same studio that fired the actor and is continuing to employ Amber Heard. Johnny, who was expected to return as Gellert Grindelwald in Fantastic Beasts 3, sadly came under scrutiny recently during his highly publicised divorce from Amber Heard. Johnny was accused of domestic abuse. Although he denied the allegation, he lost a high profile case against a newspaper who dubbed him as a wife beater. Due to allegations against him, Warner Bros asked him to step down from the role as Grindelwald in The Fantastic Beasts franchise. Johnny lost another most prominent role as Captain Jack Sparrow in Disney's Pirates of the Caribbean. On the other hand, Amber Heard began filming for Aquaman 2. Now Johnny's fans have expressed anger over the same and want justice to be served for the actor. The online hate for Amber Heard‚Äôs removal from Aquaman 2 is largely based on various unproven allegations that have been levelled against her over the years. Johnny's lawyers had also accused the actress of a calculated and manipulative lie.

snippet.title: Amber Heard‚Äôs Father Seriously Threatens Johnny Depp...
snippet.description:
Amber Heard‚Äôs Father Threatens To Kill Johnny Depp...

Johnny Depp & Amber Heard Case Update: Amber's Parents Sided With Johnny? - NEW TEXTS & EVIDENCE!! -

https://youtu.be/eWijmDzZeJU

Amber Heard‚Äôs Father‚Äôs HORRIFIC Threat to Johnny Depp!

https://youtu.be/r1vQod8BJk4

One of the biggest Hollywood debacles going on right now is the rather ugly
divorce proceedings between Johnny Depp and Amber Heard. Still, it is pretty
difficult to say who‚Äôs right and who‚Äôs wrong, but it seems like Amber Heard is
far from winning. There is so much evidence against her. The whole world
considers her as a liar and now her father has been accused of threatening to
shoot Johnny Depp. How far can Amber Heard go for the money? And is it true
that her father was ab*sive towards her when she was a kid?
Make sure you stay till the end to figure out the real reason for Amber Heard‚Äôs
father wanting to kill Johnny Depp.
But before we start with Amber Heard‚Äôs father threatens to kill Johnny Depp,
let‚Äôs got back to 2020 to see the whole picture which shows that being agressive
and violent towards people is not something which happens for the first time in
Amber Heard‚Äôs family. Back in 2020 the actress revealed to a UK court that she
previously witnessed violence at home growing up and said that Johnny Depp
‚Äúmakes dad look like a saint when he falls off the wagon‚Äù.
Amber Heard told the court that her father, David, ‚Äústruggled with alcohol and
drug abuse issues his whole life.‚Äù ‚ÄúHe is an addict and an alcoholic and he was
very violent but I love him very much,‚Äù she said.
Amber Heard said she reached out to her mom after one of Johnny Depp‚Äôs
alleged benders in March 2015 because she wanted ‚Äúsomeone to talk to who
might understand first hand how it was.‚Äù
‚ÄúMy father was violent to my mother growing up,‚Äù Amber Heard told the court.
‚ÄúThey loved each other but he was very violent to her until the end ... she
passed away.‚Äù
Amber Heard told her mom the ‚ÄúPirates of the Caribbean‚Äù actor was a
‚Äúmadman‚Äù - but insisted he was not physically abusive with her. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs ok mom.
He‚Äôs not being violent with me. He‚Äôs just even raging in general,‚Äù she wrote.
The actress, however, denied in court that she was being truthful with her
mother, saying she ‚Äújust didn‚Äôt want her to tell my dad.‚Äù

‚ÄúI felt safe to tell my mother, but I didn‚Äôt know how my dad would react,‚Äù she
said. ‚ÄúI had never been in this situation before and I didn‚Äôt know if he would
react violently ... to Johnny.‚Äù And now. Here we are. It seems like Amber
Heard was absolutely right about her father because recently he was being
agressive towards Johnny Depp and there‚Äôs a witness who revealed the entire
situation. But before we start, make sure you hit the subscribe button to knoow
the most interesting information about celebrities‚Äô lives.
So, how it all started. When it seemed as though things couldn‚Äôt get any worse,
there were some official reports saying that Johnny Depp was apparently being
threatened by Amber‚Äôs father, David Heard. According to a legal document, the
threats were overheard by a witness via a phone conversation in which her dad
made accusations that Johnny Depp was ruining his daughter‚Äôs career. Amber‚Äôs
father said about Johnny: ‚ÄúThat f**ing piece of s**t is f**ing me too because
I‚Äôm supposed to get 10% of the money and without it I can‚Äôt produce the movie
I was gunna make!...He is ruining my baby girl‚Äôs career and blackballing her in
Hollywood‚Äù. Seems like the money is the biggest reason for the Heards to
attack Johnny Depp back and forth. The threat only seemed to escalate further
when guns were brought into the conversation, with David saying: ‚ÄúAnd when I
get to him I‚Äôm going to beat the s**t out of him...I‚Äôm from Texas, and men
from Texas carry 45‚Äôs and Johnny is going to meet the f**ing end of mine!‚Äù
So, what was going on there and who was the witness? According to the report,
David Killackey, the owner of Performance Allison Transmissions who worked
on both Amber and Johnny‚Äòs classic cars, claimed that Amber became abusive
towards him and that her father made ‚Äúdeath threats‚Äù towards Johnny in a phone
call.
...
And now I want to know your opinion. What do you think about Amber and her
family being agressive towards Johnny? Do you think is it possible that any
word or action will be taken against Amber Heard‚Äôs father? Let me know your
opinion in the comments section down below.

For Part 1 of my analysis, go here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yKVNEZ-TQWU 

Part 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c-DhMmdOPjY 

Check out me Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/celtic_iron/

snippet.title: Johnny Depp About To Win Against Amber Heard Because of This?!
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp About To Win Against Amber Heard Because of This?!

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶

https://youtu.be/dJe8bl_BLDE

Related videos:

Johnny Depp WINS Against Amber Heard In Defamation Case...!!!?

https://youtu.be/vNCZ8Zy7J5U

Huge Win For Johnny Depp | Truth Always Wins

https://youtu.be/QSWHT8p62lQ

Amber Heard Friends Testify AGAINST Her & Side With Johnny Depp

https://youtu.be/IfZzdVZrPuI

Celebs divorces are box-office gold for the media, so the legal fight between
movie stars Johnny Depp and Amber Heard lasts for 5 years already. So far, the
trial has featured testimony about: violent, shrieking rows. Massive
consumption of drugs and drink. Wild punches and trashed rooms, lopped off
fingertip, and many other things. But is it true that Johnny Depp is so close to
defeating Amber Heard in a defamation case?
Make sure you stay till the end to know Johnny Depp's odds of winning the
case.
The fact that Johnny Depp recently failed to secure an appeal in the ‚Äúwife
beater‚Äù verdict against him in Britain is causing consequences on his other legal
battles in the US. Amber Heard's lawyers state that Johnny Depp's Stateside $50
million defamation lawsuit against Amber Heard should be dismissed.
Amber Heard's legal team (Heard and Charlson Bredehoft Cohen & Brown, PC
and Woods Rogers PC attorneys) declares a supplemental plea in bar, stating:
‚ÄúGiving full effect to the UK Judgments necessitates a finding that statements in
the op-ed published in the Washington Post are true ‚Äì Mr. Depp committed
domestic violence against Ms. Heard on many occasions, causing her to fear for
her life.‚Äù ‚ÄúTherefore, as a matter of law, Depp cannot prevail on any of his
claims, and Depp‚Äôs Complaint against Ms. Heard should be dismissed in its
entirety,‚Äù adds the April 13 filing that recently appeared on the Fairfax County
docket.
As the more than two-year-old matter crawls toward its new-ish April 11, 2022,
trial start date, Amber Heard has requested a May 28 hearing on her plea filing
in front of Judge Penney Azcarate, who was assigned to the case last month by
Chief Judge Bruce White.
Amber Heard's failed plan to destroy Johnny Depp in the past probably made
her try some new ideas. Now she is looking far ahead with a new strategy,
probably will help her gain a sure-footed move in the US court. The actress
seems to be absolutely desperate as she‚Äôs got nothing to lose. She has already

made so many mistakes and lied several times (and almost every time she was
caught lying). But what if her plan can actually work?
Because for now, it seems like her legal team is a little bit pushing. According to
all the testimony and evidence presented at that trial and Justice Nicol‚Äôs decree,
Amber Heard‚Äôs team believes once again that the March 2019-filed Virginia suit
should be DOA. ‚ÄúDepp cannot relitigate these factual issues, and as a result of
their preclusion, he cannot claim that the statements are false and ‚Äòactionable‚Äô
under Virginia defamation law, so his claims are barred as a matter of law,‚Äù the
plea filing states.
...
The court date for the main defamation date is in April 2022 and we will make
sure to be the first ones to deliver the latest news to you. Thanks for watching
this video and don‚Äôt forget to hit that subscribe button.

snippet.title: 10 Times Johnny Depp Warned Us About Amber Heard
snippet.description:
10 Times Johnny Depp Warned Us About Amber Heard

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶

https://youtu.be/dJe8bl_BLDE

Related videos:

10 Times Johnny Depp Tried To Warn Us About Amber Heard

https://youtu.be/jQTD2pDwoz4

10 MORE Times Johnny Depp Tried To Warn Us About AH!!!

https://youtu.be/J1UXydaYri4

Top 10 Celebrities Who Tried To Warn Us About Amber Heard

https://youtu.be/OFO6sMJGjHc

Few celebrity breakups are as controversial as the ever-unfolding drama between Johnny
Depp and Amber Heard. Most people I know are either ‚ÄúTeam Johnny‚Äù or ‚ÄúTeam Amber,‚Äù
and they‚Äôve spent a lot of time discussing who the real abuser in the troubled relationship
must have been. However, Johnny Depp was trying to warn everyone about Amber Heard
and who she is for real.
Over the past several months, we‚Äôve heard from Depp‚Äôs friends, fans, and exes who all claim
he could have never mistreated Amber because of his sweet and gentle nature. And there
have been many doubts cast upon Heard, leading people to think she‚Äôs the core abuser, a
narcissistic gold digger, and ultimately, a liar. Adding to this we have Johnny Depp‚Äôs hints
and attempts to tell the truth about his ex wife.
Amber Heard is not an obvious abuser
We like to imagine that the real abuser is always some sort of obvious monster, and that
we‚Äôre not going to be manipulated by any wolves in sheep‚Äôs clothing. Do you remember that
‚Äòmessage‚Äô to Johnny Depp‚Äôs fans when he was ‚Äòjokingly‚Äô saying: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm scared to death, I‚Äôm
frightened and I don‚Äôt know what to do, I am confused and I want to go home‚Äù. This phrase
made everyone laugh but what if it was Johnny‚Äôs cry for help? He couldn‚Äôt tell anyone what
was going on between him and Amber Heard (before the legal fight) as he is a good person
and he didn‚Äôt want to show people their dirty laundry.
Amber Heard pretended to be a victim
The myth of the obvious abuser was very convenient for Amber Heard and of course
eventually it did more harm than good, even for Amber. People easily wind up defending
their guilty friends and blaming the victims. We might mistake self-defense and coping
mechanisms by victims as "proof" of their crimes. Victims of domestic violence may even
use violence themselves against their abusers, and it can be very difficult for outsiders to
establish which person is the primary abuser and which person is the primary victim. Johnny
Depp was trying to warn everyone she was a liar but he couldn‚Äôt prove he wasn‚Äôt guilty.
Amber Heard had a strong tactic - to lie in a court. But eventually body language experts
analysed the video back in 2016 court deposition. First everyone thought Amber Heard
behaved really weird because she was stressed and scared. But according to body
language experts, she just behaved like a typical liar.
Severed Finger
Being a real man Johnny Depp didn‚Äôt tell anyone what happened with his finger for real and
was even trying to hide the facts and lied to his friends about the incident! Obviously, he
wanted to protect Amber Heard. During the Venice Film Festival 2015 conference Dakota
Johnson obviously asked Johnny Depp about his finger, Johnny answered vaguely, he
avoided the question with the joke but it seems Dakota didn‚Äôt believe him. She knew:
something was wrong. Just notice, Dakota gave him a look that says that she knows more
than he lets on.

Amber Heard made him lie for her
You may remember the story about Amber Heard‚Äôs dogs and that she had some problems
with them. In July 2015 Amber Heard brought Yorkshire terriers Pistol and Boo to the
country illegally. And to avoid problems Amber Heard asked her former employee Kevin
Murphy to lie under oath after she was charged with bringing her two dogs to Australia
illegally. Murphy claimed Heard pressured him to commit perjury about the travelling terriers
or risk losing his job. ‚ÄúShe wanted me to say essentially that it was my fault in one way or
another that the paperwork wasn‚Äôt completed, so that I could take the blame for her,‚Äù Murphy
said. And of course, she asked Johnny Depp to help with this problem. Isn‚Äôt it a warning sign
of ab**se? But probably Johnny Depp had to go along with everything Amber wanted
because he truly loved her. But she literally forced Johnny to help her with the problem and
he got in trouble as a result.

snippet.localized.title: 10 Times Johnny Depp Warned Us About Amber Heard
snippet.localized.description:
10 Times Johnny Depp Warned Us About Amber Heard

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶

https://youtu.be/dJe8bl_BLDE

Related videos:

10 Times Johnny Depp Tried To Warn Us About Amber Heard

https://youtu.be/jQTD2pDwoz4

10 MORE Times Johnny Depp Tried To Warn Us About AH!!!

https://youtu.be/J1UXydaYri4

Top 10 Celebrities Who Tried To Warn Us About Amber Heard

https://youtu.be/OFO6sMJGjHc

Few celebrity breakups are as controversial as the ever-unfolding drama between Johnny
Depp and Amber Heard. Most people I know are either ‚ÄúTeam Johnny‚Äù or ‚ÄúTeam Amber,‚Äù
and they‚Äôve spent a lot of time discussing who the real abuser in the troubled relationship
must have been. However, Johnny Depp was trying to warn everyone about Amber Heard
and who she is for real.
Over the past several months, we‚Äôve heard from Depp‚Äôs friends, fans, and exes who all claim
he could have never mistreated Amber because of his sweet and gentle nature. And there
have been many doubts cast upon Heard, leading people to think she‚Äôs the core abuser, a
narcissistic gold digger, and ultimately, a liar. Adding to this we have Johnny Depp‚Äôs hints
and attempts to tell the truth about his ex wife.
Amber Heard is not an obvious abuser
We like to imagine that the real abuser is always some sort of obvious monster, and that
we‚Äôre not going to be manipulated by any wolves in sheep‚Äôs clothing. Do you remember that
‚Äòmessage‚Äô to Johnny Depp‚Äôs fans when he was ‚Äòjokingly‚Äô saying: ‚ÄúI‚Äôm scared to death, I‚Äôm
frightened and I don‚Äôt know what to do, I am confused and I want to go home‚Äù. This phrase
made everyone laugh but what if it was Johnny‚Äôs cry for help? He couldn‚Äôt tell anyone what
was going on between him and Amber Heard (before the legal fight) as he is a good person
and he didn‚Äôt want to show people their dirty laundry.
Amber Heard pretended to be a victim
The myth of the obvious abuser was very convenient for Amber Heard and of course
eventually it did more harm than good, even for Amber. People easily wind up defending
their guilty friends and blaming the victims. We might mistake self-defense and coping
mechanisms by victims as "proof" of their crimes. Victims of domestic violence may even
use violence themselves against their abusers, and it can be very difficult for outsiders to
establish which person is the primary abuser and which person is the primary victim. Johnny
Depp was trying to warn everyone she was a liar but he couldn‚Äôt prove he wasn‚Äôt guilty.
Amber Heard had a strong tactic - to lie in a court. But eventually body language experts
analysed the video back in 2016 court deposition. First everyone thought Amber Heard
behaved really weird because she was stressed and scared. But according to body
language experts, she just behaved like a typical liar.
Severed Finger
Being a real man Johnny Depp didn‚Äôt tell anyone what happened with his finger for real and
was even trying to hide the facts and lied to his friends about the incident! Obviously, he
wanted to protect Amber Heard. During the Venice Film Festival 2015 conference Dakota
Johnson obviously asked Johnny Depp about his finger, Johnny answered vaguely, he
avoided the question with the joke but it seems Dakota didn‚Äôt believe him. She knew:
something was wrong. Just notice, Dakota gave him a look that says that she knows more
than he lets on.

Amber Heard made him lie for her
You may remember the story about Amber Heard‚Äôs dogs and that she had some problems
with them. In July 2015 Amber Heard brought Yorkshire terriers Pistol and Boo to the
country illegally. And to avoid problems Amber Heard asked her former employee Kevin
Murphy to lie under oath after she was charged with bringing her two dogs to Australia
illegally. Murphy claimed Heard pressured him to commit perjury about the travelling terriers
or risk losing his job. ‚ÄúShe wanted me to say essentially that it was my fault in one way or
another that the paperwork wasn‚Äôt completed, so that I could take the blame for her,‚Äù Murphy
said. And of course, she asked Johnny Depp to help with this problem. Isn‚Äôt it a warning sign
of ab**se? But probably Johnny Depp had to go along with everything Amber wanted
because he truly loved her. But she literally forced Johnny to help her with the problem and
he got in trouble as a result.

snippet.title: Judge sides with Johnny Depp ACLU must reveal if Amber Heard donated $7M
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp has notched a victory in his lengthy legal battle against ex-wife Amber Heard. A New York judge has partially granted a petition from the "Pirates of the Caribbean" star to determine if Heard donated the entirety of her $7 million divorce settlement to the American Civil Liberties Union and to Children's Hospital Los Angeles, as she pledged. As a result of the ruling, the ACLU must release documents that confirm whether or not Heard followed through on the donation promise, which has become a point of contention in the former couple's legal saga.‚ÄúMr. Depp is most gratified by the Court‚Äôs decision," Depp's attorney Benjamin Chew said in a statement to USA TODAY. USA TODAY has reached out to Heard's attorney and to the ACLU for comment. In November, Depp lost a libel lawsuit in London against the publisher of The Sun tabloid, which had labeled him a "wife beater" in a 2018 headline after Heard accused him of abuse in Los Angeles in 2016 as they were ending their short, volatile marriage. The case pitted Depp against a powerful tabloid and its editor, with Heard as their star witness. In March, Depp was refused an appeal after his lawyer Andrew Caldecott argued that Heard's donation pledge was a ‚Äúcalculated and manipulative lie" that "tipped the scales against Mr. Depp from the very beginning."Caldecott also alleged one of Heard's intended charitable beneficiaries, Children's Hospital Los Angeles, wrote to Depp's business adviser in 2019 saying Heard had not made any payments. Lawyers for The Sun's publisher rejected the arguments in court in March, saying Heard did not lie about the donations because she was pledging to pay the sums over 10 years. She had made ‚Äúa number of payments already in pursuance of these pledges," said Adam Wolanski, representing News Group Newspapers. Johnny Depp loses bid to appeal UK court ruling that he assaulted ex-wife Amber HeardThe High Court ruling came after a three-week circus-like trial in July, during which Depp and Heard both took the stand and both were damaged by lurid testimony about drinking, drug use, fighting and room-trashing. The judge ruled that "the great majority" of Heard's claims of abuse, as presented by the tabloid's publisher in its defense, were mostly true. Proceedings now move to Virginia, where a separate case arose after Heard published a column in the Washington Post in December 2018, proclaiming herself a victim of domestic abuse and suggesting, without actually using his name, that Depp was the alleged abuser. Three months later, Depp filed a lawsuit in Fairfax County (where the Post is printed) seeking $50 million and accusing his ex-wife of defaming him with "hoax" allegations of domestic abuse. Heard shot back by filing more than 300 pages of documents in Virginia, expanding on the abuse allegations she lodged against Depp during their divorce in 2016, claiming Depp regularly beat her up before she married him in 2015 and continued to do so during their 18-month marriage.


All data is taken from the source: http://usatoday.com
Article Link: https://www.usatoday.com/story/entert...

snippet.title: AMBER HEARD IS DONE - Aquaman 2 ACTORS HATED Filming With Amber - Support Depp | Celebrity Craze
snippet.description:
AMBER HEARD IS DONE - Aquaman 2 ACTORS HATED Filming With Amber - Support Johnny Depp | Celebrity Craze

Did Amber Heard just get booted for Aquaman 2? This would be great news to Johnny Depp and Aquaman fans around the world. The #FireAmberHeard movement is going strong. It seems the Aquaman 2 director, James Wan, does not even want Amber Heard in the movie. 

It seems like everyone is turning against Amber Heard. Including the actors in the movie such as Jason Momoa, Nicole Kidman, William Dafoe, etc. The Johnny Depp Amber Heard legal battle is still at the forefront of celebrity news. 

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court. 

Ever since the recent release of the footage of the LAPD officers from the penthouse night of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, things have not been looking all too bright for Amber Heard. Her team has been working tirelessly in order to back up her side, however Johnny Depp seems to have made the attempt to strike back.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Is FINISHED! Why She's Losing ALL Her Supporters! Amber Heard Johnny Depp Lawsuit UPDATE
snippet.description:
As Johnny Depp and Amber Heard get deeper into their $50 million dollar lawsuit, lots and lots of fans, people, and even previous Amber Heard supporters are strolling away from her side and are choosing to side with Johnny Depp instead. You may remember that after losing his libel case against the news publisher ‚ÄúThe Sun‚Äù, who gave him a very bad lable following Amber‚Äôs claims that he had hurt her, Johnny lost his chance to reprise his major role as Grindelwald in the upcoming third installment of the trilogy ‚ÄúFantastic Beasts‚Äù, a prequel series to Harry Potter. Because of this, a huge volume of Johnny Depp fans around the globe were upset and angered, which led them to sign a petition for Warner Bros. to fire Amber from her role in the upcoming Aquaman sequel as well. However, despite reaching and even going over 1.6 million votes, the production company chose to let Amber stay in the movie. So how does Amber lose such a tremendous amount of supporters during the time that she needed them the most? What could Amber possibly have done to make her supporters lose interest in her? Well, let‚Äôs find out in this video. But before anything else, make sure to hit that subscribe button first and smash that notification bell for more updates. Let‚Äôs dive in!

Johnny and Amber‚Äôs romance started well, if one may say, before it all went down into ashes. There are those kinds of divorces that are amicable splits, while there are also divorce cases that are messy. Johnny and Amber‚Äôs divorce may be one of the messiest and chaotic in history. But how did it all come down to this? Let‚Äôs go back to the beginning. Johnny and Amber first ignited a spark between them when they starred together in the 2011 comedy-drama film, The Rum Diary. Johnny played a journalist who was immediately smitten with Amber‚Äôs character. However, this love story between the two quickly travelled from the screen to real life. Amber Heard even told Vogue quickly after the release of the film that, ‚ÄúWorking with Johnny was torture. It was better than I ever imagined, which is really saying something.‚Äù Technically, hearing these words from the actress already hinted that the two really hit it off easily during their film taping, and even though the two of them did not quickly jump into a relationship right after the film shooting, the same year that the film was released, the relationships they both were in at the time fell apart, and that suggested quite a rare coincidence. Just a year after the film‚Äôs release, the two officially started dating. Their relationship seemed quite beautiful, and as a proof of this, in 2014, just a couple of months into dating, Amber was spotted wearing an engagement ring, where Johnny also made an announcement about their upcoming wedding. Another year after, the couple held a private wedding ceremony at their home in LA. Fans were really happy about how things were going between the two.

In 2016, Amber Heard filed for divorce. It shocked many people, especially their fans who thought they were living the best days of their married life, but turned out it wasn‚Äôt the case at all. Along with filing for divorce, Amber also accused Johnny of physically hurting her, providing some photos as evidence of Johnny‚Äôs acts. However, these incidents were proven to be fabricated by the police. She also applied for a restraining order against Johnny, which made many people at that time believe that she was telling the truth. Many fans supported her, and it was then as well that she used her newfound acclaim and victimhood to front as one of the most public faces of the #MeToo movement, and subsequently, to serve as ambassador and speaker for various entities, organizations, and companies, many of whom rewarded Amber financially for her time, image, and story. BUT, Johnny Depp‚Äôs team and a lot of fans as well, saw this as Amber‚Äôs way to manipulate people into thinking she is a victim rather than a perpetrator. In line with this, Amber also penned an article in the Washington Post.

Apart from this, fans and supporters of Amber also started to lose the courage to defend and support her as evidence of her extra marital affairs surfaced, showing her with actor James Franco and multi-billionaire Elon Musk. Elon had been issued a subpoena by Johnny Depp‚Äôs team.

As of now, despite all the chaos swirling around the their case, Amber‚Äôs team has tried to dismiss it twice already. 

That‚Äôs all for today, if you enjoyed that, make sure to hit that notification bell and subscribe button for more videos like this. Stay tuned!

Related videos:
Heard SUPPORT FAILS as EVERYONE GIVES UP?! It's FINALLY GAME OVER?!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X3VNrAHdzuo

Hollywood Insider EXPOSES HEARD in BOMBSHELL letter! THIS IS HUGE!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=evTNFz3H_xo

snippet.title: Amber Heard‚Äôs Assistant Exposes Her For Lying
snippet.description:
Amber Heard‚Äôs Assistant Exposes Her For Lying

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

How Amber Heard Destroyed Her Own Career

https://youtu.be/gEfWUbRfFR8

Related videos:

Amber Heard's Assisstant Finally Exposes Her For Lying

https://youtu.be/iX63Sqkr8sE

Amber Heard's assistant tells her side of the story

https://youtu.be/ip3OBqUeGLk

Body Language Analyst REACTS to Amber Heard's CRINGE Deposition | Faces Episode 15

https://youtu.be/hQFFm_X2lps

That‚Äôs crazy, as the tables have turned and now Amber Heard is the one who‚Äôs criticized by
so many people. But why is she the subject of such a toxic response? Johnny and Amber
have both accused each other of abuse. First, people thought that Johnny was the ‚Äòbad guy‚Äô
but now, fans think that Amber is the one who is doing it for attention, enjoying the drama,
manipulating the truth, exaggerating reality.
Moreover, people were absolutely furious after Amber Heard‚Äôs former assistant Kate James
exposed Amber Heard for stealing her sexual assault story.
For so many women struggling from abuse, it was difficult to hear but, that's true that Amber
really lied about the fact that Johnny abused her. And the whole world was shocked after
Kate James, Amber Heard‚Äôs former personal assistant, alleged that Heard had appropriated
her story of being a ‚Äúsexual violence survivor,‚Äù giving evidence at London‚Äôs Royal Courts of
Justice on the seventh day of Johnny Depp‚Äôs libel trial against the publisher of The Sun
newspaper.
However, the fact that Kate exposed Amber is really good for Johnny, as now he is suing
News Group Newspapers and journalist Dan Wootton for an article on The Sun website that
described him as a ‚Äúwife beater.‚Äù Depp denies that he was violent toward Heard, to whom he
was married from 2015 to 2017.
Kate gave evidence in support of Depp, and said she had told Heard that she was raped at
machete-point in Brazil about 25 years ago. She said she was shocked to learn that in a
witness statement, Heard misrepresented and exploited the incident.
‚ÄúShe referred directly to a violent rape that occurred to me 26 years ago and she twisted it
into her own story and she used it for her own use," Kate James said by video link from Los
Angeles. ‚ÄúI am a sexual violence survivor and that‚Äôs very, very serious to take that stance if
you are not one," she added.
When Kate she read Amber Heard‚Äôs submissions, she said, ‚Äúto my utter shock and dismay, I
discovered that Ms Heard had in fact stolen my sexual violence conversation with her and
twisted it into her own story to benefit herself. This of course caused me extreme distress
and outrage that she would dare to attempt to use the most harrowing experience of my life
as her own narrative.‚Äù
Referring to Amber Heard‚Äôs drinking habits, James said in a witness statement: ‚ÄúAmber
would drink vast quantities of red wine each night.‚Äù Plus, in evidence given remotely from
Los Angeles, Kate James also said she had regularly received a barrage of drunken,
abusive and incoherent text messages from Heard between 2am and 4am.
In her declaration, James outlines how she spent large amounts of time with Heard during
her employment - sometimes up to seven days a week, often in intimate settings. That is
significant, she says, because many of Heard's allegations of physical abuse date to that
time period - and she never saw any evidence of it. Instead, she claims to have seen ample
evidence of Heard's own abusive behavior, which was often directed at her.

‚ÄúAmber was regularly verbally and mentally abusive and would often scream at me... over
the smallest things,‚Äù she wrote. ‚ÄúShe would fly into blind rages where no-one could reason
with her, and even if I was trying to offer an explanation, I didn‚Äôt think that she could hear me
as she was so angry.‚Äù
Kate James claims the actress would often binge on wine and drugs - specifically magic
mushrooms and MDMA - and text her abuse throughout the night.
‚ÄúWhen I woke up in the morning, there would almost always be a barrage of incoherent
abuse sent to me from Amber by text between around 2am and 4am. I discovered later that
she had gone ahead and deleted all evidence of abusive texts from that ICloud account,‚Äù
she claimed. The abuse was so severe, that James said it left her emaciated from stress and
caused concern among her friends and family.
...

the drama and does it for clout? Let me know your opinion in the comments section down

snippet.title: Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Faces Prison After This‚Ä¶

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

The Downfall Of Amber Heard: LAPD Footage That Exposed Her

https://youtu.be/U8kIY_JREHk

Related videos:

Amber Heard Officially Charged With Perjury & Faces 4 Years In Prison

https://youtu.be/IqJ7xx-RY1E

Amber Heard Facing 10 Years In Prison For Fake Johnny Depp Accusations!?

https://youtu.be/tybOcw3gQzc

Amber Heard Faces 10 Years In Prison For Accusations Against Johnny Depp!!!

https://youtu.be/UvsHWTGHmts

Amber Heard and Johnny Depp have been involved in major legal battles for years now and
it seems that this drama is coming to an end now with new revelations and plot twists. It is
not easy to keep up with Johnny and Amber's case but what is most important here is that
Amber Heard is potentially facing jail time.
The court drama made a major plot twist when Johnny Depp filed a defamation lawsuit
against his ex-wife. He not only claimed that she lied in court, but also that she was abusive
toward him. However, the actors will need to wait even longer to get an official court ruling. If
the court rules in Johnny Depp‚Äôs favor, Amber Heard could be facing up to three years of jail
time.
Basically, Amber Heard claimed that Johnny Depp had physically and emotionally abused
her. Their original court drama in 2015 resulted in a restraining order against Johnny Depp,
but that‚Äôs also where the blurry lines began. Johnny claims that Amber had faked her black
eye seen at the court, and Amber Heard‚Äôs stylist corroborated this.
She stated, ‚ÄúThroughout the day of December 16, 2015, I could see clearly that Amber
Heard did not have any visible marks, bruises, cuts, or injuries to her face or any other part
of her body.‚Äù
But this was not the only time Amber Heard lied and was caught lying. Why would she do
that all the time? It was her strategy. She wanted to play a victim and she was good at it until
the truth came out. Even in 2017 she still managed to convince everyone that in this
situation she suffered from Johnny Depp's actions against her. Amber Heard made people
trust her and, moreover, she almost ruined Johnny Depp‚Äôs career, as the publicity called him
a ‚Äòwife beater‚Äô and supported Amber and sympathized with her.
While nothing could be proven, Amber Heard‚Äôs accusations against Johnny Depp were
enough to significantly damage Johnny‚Äôs reputation and acting career. The story also almost
derailed the latest Pirates of the Caribbean movie, Dead Men Tell No Tales, Johnny Depp
has faced significant levels of hate and ostracizing over the past five years. But then things
have changed.
The first thing which ruined Amber Heard's vicious plan was the leaked audio. And since the
audio leak, the internet has already returned to Johnny Depp's side of the issue. Johnny
Depp filed a defamation lawsuit against his ex-wife just over a year ago, and Amber Heard
attempted to get the case dismissed but her request was denied.
Johnny Depp initially filed the suit to sue Amber Heard for $50 million. But now it appears
that she could not only be forced to pay the sum, but she could also be facing jail time.
According to the International Business Times:
‚ÄúIf Heard will be proven guilty of faking her bruises, she could face three years of
imprisonment. According to the Wallin & Klarich Law Firm, the California Penal Code Section
141 PC stated that it is illegal to alter, modify, plant, place, conceal, manufacture or move
any physical matter with the intention of causing someone to be charged with a crime. Some
would face felony charges for this‚Äù.
But it doesn‚Äôt stop there. Amber Heard could also be charged with offering false evidence.
These are also considered felony crimes and each carry a maximum sentence of up to three
years.
And again, it doesn‚Äôt stop here. More and more evidence has come forward to showcase
that Amber Heard was the one who abused Johnny Depp and that she had a strategy of
making people think she was innocent. The number of times Amber lied is impressive: she
was caught lying in court (the audio recording situation), she asked or even forced people to
lie for her in court and she stole her assistant‚Äôs s*xual assault story and used it as her own.
Later it turned out that Amber Heard has a history of violence.
...
And now I want to know your opinion about this situation. Do you think Amber Heard is
facing jail time? And what‚Äôs gonna happen with Johnny Depp‚Äôs career? Let me know your
opinion in the comments section down below.

snippet.title: AMBER SHOCKED At ELON - Elon Musk REGRETS DATING Amber Heard - Johnny Depp Lawsuit | The Gossipy
snippet.description:
AMBER SHOCKED At ELON - Elon Musk REGRETS DATING Amber Heard - Johnny Depp Lawsuit | The Gossipy

Elon Musk just keeps getting dragged back into the Johnny Depp Amber Heard celeb drama. Elon Musk, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard are back on the frontlines of celebrity news. Amber Heard just had a baby girl and rumors are swirling on who the baby's father is. 

Many are saying it is Johnny Depp. Some are saying is Elon Musk himself. Elon Musk and Amber Heard are past lovers and rumors are swirling that Elon Musk paid Amber Heard's 7 million donation to the ACLU back in 2016. So these two have a history together.

But no public statements have been made in this regard by either Elon Musk, Johnny Depp or Amber Heard. So no one knows for sure yet. In this video, we breakdown the story in detail. This celebrity drama goes down while the Johnny Depp Amber Heard civil court case rages on.

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court.

snippet.title: Amber Heard FORCES Judge To Dismiss Lawsuit  - Johnny Depp Amber Heard Lawsuit UPDATE
snippet.description:
As we all know now, famous actor Johnny Depp, who played numerous roles in the past, and his then wife Amber Heard, who had recently appeared in the DC movie Aquaman, are now in the middle of a preposterous chaos that all stemmed from their past marriage, broken vows, and well, a lot of ‚Äúphysical‚Äù, problems. But how did all of this frenzy start? How did the romantic private wedding go down this badly? And what were the actions taken by Amber Heard that were angering the judges so much? Let‚Äôs all find out in this video. But before we go any further, make sure to hit that subscribe button and notification bell first for more updates. So, let‚Äôs begin!

If you remember, Johnny Depp has been at the height of his career in the industry for many, many years now. He started acting as early as the 1980‚Äôs, when he first appeared in the horror-slash-thriller film ‚ÄúA Nightmare on Elm Street '', and played a minor role as the boyfriend of the main character. This helped Johnny begin his acting career, landing more minor roles and then major ones. Later on, he became a popular star of the classic, eccentric director Tim Burton‚Äôs films, where he portrayed various roles that all have these similarities: unique, bizarre, and kinda creepy in their own ways. In the romantic fantasy film ‚ÄúEdward Scissorhands‚Äù, he met his ex-partner Winona Ryder, whom we all see now in the sci-fi series Stranger Things. The two of them dated for four years, and even though the couple ended things between them in the 90‚Äôs, Winona still defended Johnny against Amber Heard on her recent allegations of abuse. He also played a few roles with Helena Bonham Carter in many Tim Burton films such as Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, Alice in Wonderland and Alice Through the Looking Glass, Corpse Bride, Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street, and Dark Shadows. One of the most widely-known appearances of Johnny Depp that perhaps brought him the largest commercial and critical success was the Disney media franchise ‚ÄúPirates of the Carribean‚Äù series, where he landed and reprised his lead role for all five movies that ran from 2003 to 2017. 

Amber Heard, on the other hand, started her acting career in 2003, first by appearing in two music videos, and then later on landing small supporting roles in three various television series. This then later on elevated her to more film and television roles, both in the supporting and lead actress roles. Her latest film that hit commercial success was the 2018 DC movie ‚ÄúAquaman‚Äù, where she co-starred alongside Jason Momoa as Mera, the Atlantean Queen. However, even amidst the controversies circling her divorce with Johnny Depp, she managed to keep and reprise her role in the 2021 superhero film ‚ÄúZack Snyder‚Äôs Justice League'', a director‚Äôs cut of the 2017 film. Not only that, but she also starred in the post-apocalyptic miniseries ‚ÄúThe Stand‚Äù, which was based on Stephen King‚Äôs novel of the same name. Here, she co-starred alongside Alexander Skarsg√•rd, James Marden, and Odessa Young, and it premiered in December 2020. This upset fans because as Johnny was being banned from reprising his role as Grindelwald, Amber got to star in more films and series, and not only that, she was also reported to reappear as Mera in the sequel of the DC movie Aquaman which is set to start filming in July of 2021. Many fans saw this as an unfair treatment, given that both actors slash ex-lovers are facing the ongoing lawsuits between them.

And just recently, there has been a new occurrence in the ongoing defamation case against Amber‚Äôs article on The Washington Post, and it seems like Johnny‚Äôs side is stepping a little ahead of the game.

Amber Heard has been looking into Disney and what the company knew about Johnny‚Äôs actions and behavior during his time on the Pirates of the Caribbean films. For his part, Johnny has asserted Amber has lied on several occasions, including saying she would give their divorce settlement to charity but didn‚Äôt, and also said she had asserted he was violent once, when police body cam footage allegedly showed otherwise. Not so cool, Amber. Her lawyer has also said that the Aquaman 2 actress has not been able to pay out the full divorce settlement to charity.

That‚Äôs all for our latest updates for today. If you enjoyed that video, you can check out our video about the celebrities who defended Johnny Depp in his lawsuit against Amber Heard, and how a Virginian judge scolded Amber in her recent defamation case. Be sure to smash that like and subscribe buttons and hit that notification bell for more videos like this. Stay tuned!

snippet.title: Amber Heard FIRED From Aquaman 2 after Johnny Depp Lawsuit?!
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp and Amber Heard‚Äôs case started years ago, when the latter filed for divorce and accused Johnny of hurting her. However, their feud that rooted from their messy marriage did not end there, and now, the case is swirling once again as their latest court trial is about to come in July this year. As the trials are coming near, the issue that has somehow been buried deep in the internet has recently surfaced once again, and guess who‚Äôs been the subject of ridicule these past few weeks? You guessed that right, Amber Heard. Amber seemed to have been losing more and more of her supporters due to more and more evidence surfacing in the media, including the fact that she couldn‚Äôt provide proof that she donated the money she got from her divorce settlement, which she promised to donate to charity. But where is it now?  Then there was evidence of her having affairs with actor, James Franco and multi-billionaire, Elon Musk. But what angered most people was the fact that Johnny Depp was forced to step down from his role as Grindelwald in the upcoming third franchise of the film trilogy ‚ÄúFantastic Beasts‚Äù. Now, the trilogy is quite a big deal in the entertainment industry, considering that it is the prequel series to one of the most prominent film series of all time, ‚ÄúHarry Potter‚Äù. And aside from this, Johnny is actually an incredibly big name in the industry as well, and not just because of his very famous role as Jack Sparrow, but also because he has starred in countless movies too. But now that Johnny had been removed from his role, people‚Äôs fury shot directly at Amber Heard, as she was going back to reprise her role in the second installment of the DC Extended Universe film Aquaman, despite the lawsuits she is currently facing. Many, many fans were enraged by this, and some even started a petition to request Warner Bros. to fire Amber Heard, the same way they did to Johnny. But after a very long deliberation, did these people who fought for Johnny Depp‚Äôs equal treatment in the industry actually succeed? Had Warner Bros. finally come to their senses and fired Amber Heard from their newest DC film? Well, let‚Äôs find out in this video. But before everything else, make sure to hit that subscribe button first and smash that notification bell for more updates. So, let‚Äôs begin!

Let‚Äôs backtrack a little bit into Johnny and Amber‚Äôs career. Johnny Depp has been at the height of his career in the industry for many, many years now, and despite everything he is going through, he is nowhere close to a stop. He started acting as early as the 1980‚Äôs, when he first appeared in the horror-slash-thriller film ‚ÄúA Nightmare on Elm Street '', and played a minor role as the boyfriend of the main character. This helped Johnny begin his acting career, landing more minor roles and then major ones, including in the 2010 romantic thriller film ‚ÄúThe Tourist‚Äù in which he co-starred with respected actress Angelina Jolie.

After many more roles, Johnny landed one of his biggest commercial films, the critically acclaimed Disney media franchise, the ‚ÄúPirates of the Carribean‚Äù series, which is one of the major projects that really skyrocketed Johnny‚Äôs career into its highest point. In this series, he worked with numerous legendary actors and actresses, and worked on the lead role of Jack Sparrow, which earned him a remarkably huge fan following, as he reprised his role in all five movies that ran from 2003 to 2017. Some people even call him Jack Sparrow more often than his real name. Needless to say, he was and still is, a legend in the film industry. But we can‚Äôt say that now in his 2011 comedy drama film ‚ÄúThe Rum Diary‚Äù which we can now safely say was not the brightest decision he made, as this was the film where he met his ex-wife, Amber Heard.

On the other hand, Amber Heard started her acting career in 2003, first by appearing in two music videos, and then later in landing small supporting roles in three various television series. This then later on elevated her to more film and television roles as both a supporting and lead actress. Her latest film that hit commercial success was the 2018 DCEU movie ‚ÄúAquaman‚Äù, where she co-starred alongside Jason Momoa as Mera, the Atlantean Queen. 

Above all these, Amber Heard manages to keep her name in the headlines as many more issues come up. She even angered a judge in Virginia once, warning her not to waste the court‚Äôs time. 

That‚Äôs all for today, we hope you enjoyed that video and if you did, don‚Äôt forget to subscribe and hit that notification bell for more videos like this. Stay tuned!

But after a very long deliberation, did these people who fought for Johnny Depp‚Äôs equal treatment in the industry actually succeed? Had Warner Bros. finally come to their senses and fired Amber Heard from their newest DC film? Well, let‚Äôs find out in this video. But before everything else, make sure to hit that subscribe button first and smash that notification bell for more updates. So, let‚Äôs begin!

Let‚Äôs backtrack a little bit into Johnny and Amber‚Äôs career. Johnny Depp has been at the height of his career in the industry for many, many years now, and despite everything he is going through, he is nowhere close to a stop. He started acting as early as the 1980‚Äôs, when he first appeared in the horror-slash-thriller film ‚ÄúA Nightmare on Elm Street '', and played a minor role as the boyfriend of the main character. This helped Johnny begin his acting career, landing more minor roles and then major ones, including in the 2010 romantic thriller film ‚ÄúThe Tourist‚Äù in which he co-starred with respected actress Angelina Jolie.

After many more roles, Johnny landed one of his biggest commercial films, the critically acclaimed Disney media franchise, the ‚ÄúPirates of the Carribean‚Äù series, which is one of the major projects that really skyrocketed Johnny‚Äôs career into its highest point. In this series, he worked with numerous legendary actors and actresses, and worked on the lead role of Jack Sparrow, which earned him a remarkably huge fan following, as he reprised his role in all five movies that ran from 2003 to 2017. Some people even call him Jack Sparrow more often than his real name. Needless to say, he was and still is, a legend in the film industry. But we can‚Äôt say that now in his 2011 comedy drama film ‚ÄúThe Rum Diary‚Äù which we can now safely say was not the brightest decision he made, as this was the film where he met his ex-wife, Amber Heard.

On the other hand, Amber Heard started her acting career in 2003, first by appearing in two music videos, and then later in landing small supporting roles in three various television series. This then later on elevated her to more film and television roles as both a supporting and lead actress. Her latest film that hit commercial success was the 2018 DCEU movie ‚ÄúAquaman‚Äù, where she co-starred alongside Jason Momoa as Mera, the Atlantean Queen. 

Above all these, Amber Heard manages to keep her name in the headlines as many more issues come up. She even angered a judge in Virginia once, warning her not to waste the court‚Äôs time. 

That‚Äôs all for today, we hope you enjoyed that video and if you did, don‚Äôt forget to subscribe and hit that notification bell for more videos like this. Stay tuned!

snippet.description:
Amber Heard Exposed After Leaked LAPD Footage‚Ä¶

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

How Amber Heard Destroyed Her Own Career

https://youtu.be/gEfWUbRfFR8

Related videos:

Body Cam Footage PROVING Amber Heard LIED about Johnny Depp!

https://youtu.be/dEhhgg43AiI

Amber Heard OFFICIALLY Faces 4 Years In PRISON For Lying In Court...

https://youtu.be/dEhhgg43AiI

The FBI Is Coming For Amber Heard - BREAKING! - Justice (Finally?!) For Johnny Depp

https://youtu.be/QR9_W4jVEcQ

The various court cases involving Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been all
over the news over the last several months and still it is unclear who's right and
who's wrong. But this time there's never-seen-before evidence: body cam
footage from the Los Angeles police department (LAPD) officers who
responded to the 911 call and this evidence seems to change the compilation of
the case.
Make sure you stay till the end to see the final downfall of Amber Heard. This
time she is exposed for real. So, what was on the bodycam footage and why it
could change the whole case.
Nobody expected this was coming but Johnny Depp's attorneys claim that
never-before-seen body cam footage from the Los Angeles police department
(LAPD) officers who responded to the second of two 911 calls proves that
Johnny Depp did not have the violent altercation with his ex-wife! Moreover, it
proves that Amber Heard lied about the alleged brawl that took place in May
2016.
However, it's not the first time that Amber Heard lied. Let‚Äôs look back at the
following things: donating the entirety of the divorce settlement money to a
children‚Äôs charity, an abuse story that she stole from her former colleague, the
‚Äòdogs story‚Äô, never hitting Johnny Depp, and many other things. Amber Heard
lied about all of these things while under oath in the UK high courts. Now
there‚Äôs even more evidence that she lied.
And now, ahead of Johnny Depp's upcoming $50 million defamation lawsuit
against his ex-wife, which will take place in Virginia in April 2022, the actor's
lawyers are revealing depositions from the officers and body camera footage
from them and the attorneys are claiming that cops do not support Amber
Heard's allegations.
Giving testimony, Amber Heard claimed that Johnny Depp hit her in the face
with a phone and tore out clumps of her hair in an extended altercation that took
place throughout their shared home at the time. Amber Heard and her friend,
Rocky Pennington, both gave depositions about the incident and each of them

described the scene as a violent mess. Rocky Pennington described it as, "They
have a big kitchen island in the middle of the kitchen and on there, there's
candles and like fruit and, you know, glass, like jars and vases and things like
that. And he just was hitting everything with the wine bottle, just smashing it all
off. So there was fruit on the floor and baskets and, you know, glass bottles and
flowers."
Amber Heard's description was, "We have huge heavy silver candlesticks,
candelabra sticks. Those were on the floor broken. Baskets of fruit that we had
on the kitchen island. There ... fruit everywhere. Baskets on the ground. The
containers holding the spoons and forks, kitchen utensils, those were spilled. He
broke a lot of glass things that left glass on the floor ... when he walked out into
the hallway, you could see wine spilled all over the ground and wine on the
walls and ... and so I knew that at least he had gone through there and was like
sloshing wine anywhere."
Right now we have a chance to take a look at what really happened that night!
...
And now I want to know your opinion of the matter. Do you think this evidence
will help Johnny Depp to prove that he is not the ab*ser? And do you think
Amber Heard will continue to put up the fight? Let me know your opinion in the
comments section down below and make sure you hit the subscribe button.

#amber_heard_aquaman #amber_heard_age #paige_heard


Amber Heard is an American actress and model. She is best known for her roles in the films Never Back Down, Pineapple Express, The Stepfather, Zombieland, and The Joneses, The River Why, The Ward, Drive Angry, The Rum Diary, Paranoia, Magic Mike XXL, and London Fields. For her work in The Rum Diary, she won a Spotlight Award at the Hollywood Film Festival. She was also featured in two music videos ‚Äì Kenny Chesney‚Äôs ‚ÄúThere Goes My Life‚Äù and Eisley‚Äôs ‚ÄúI Wasn‚Äôt Prepared‚Äù. Born Amber Laura Heard on April 22, 1986 in Austin, Texas, USA to Paige Parsons and David Heard, she belongs to Scots-Irish (Northern Irish), English, Irish, German, Scottish, and Welsh descent. She has one younger sister named Whitney Heard. She dropped out of school at the age of 17 to pursue modeling. She made her film debut in an acclaimed sports drama Friday Night Lights (2004). She was married to actor Johnny Depp from 2015 to 2017.

snippet.title: Amber Heard Sentenced In Court After Shocking Details Surface‚Ä¶
snippet.description:
Amber Heard Sentenced In Court After Shocking Details Surface‚Ä¶

Subscribe to Binge Watch -  http://tiny.cc/bingewatch

WATCH NEXT üëá

Disney Apologizes To Johnny Depp After This...

https://youtu.be/siGE-fVUHG4

Related videos:

Judge Has Officially Sentenced Amber Heard In US Court...

https://youtu.be/al07kyPdM78

Amber Heard OFFICIALLY Gets Sentenced To Four Years In Prison!!! (Johnny Depp Victory)

https://youtu.be/M1lxGj_KkyQ

Amber Heard Faces 10 Years In Prison For Accusations Against Johnny Depp!!!

https://youtu.be/UvsHWTGHmts

The saga of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp‚Äôs messy divorce continues. But this
time things went really harsh for Amber Heard. According to the latest reports,
Amber Heard is at risk of facing jail time because now she is under
investigation by the LAPD for perjury concerning the 2016 incident in which
Depp allegedly hit his then-wife in the face. For now, Amber Heard is trying to
get the case dismissed officially.
I‚Äôm going to break it down for you, but before we start, hit that subscribe button
and make sure you stay till the end to know if the game is over for Amber
Heard.
After Johnny Deepp's defeat in the British High Court last year, his legal team
has plans to appeal. But this is more difficult than it seems because Amber
Heard‚Äôs legal team has tried to get the U.S.-based lawsuit dismissed, arguing
that the findings in the U.K. libel suit should be adopted. As for Johnny Depp‚Äôs
lawyer? He‚Äôs calling it a ‚Äúhail Mary.‚Äù
Apparently, Amber Heard's legal team doesn't want to give up without a fight
and they've filed a motion to stay discovery on the defamation claims and also a
memorandum in support of her motion for leave. Her team believes that due to
the libel case results, which found in favor of The Sun after that outlet called
Johnny Depp a ‚Äúwife beater,‚Äù that the judgment rendered should be applicable
in the US as well. The motion reads:
With the finality of the Judgment, rendered after Mr. Depp presented his best
evidence and arguments on the exact same factual issues assessed here, Mr.
Depp should be precluded from seeking yet another bite of the apple, where he
has fully adjudicated his dispute and lost. Because of the UK Judgment, the
entire world may now say, forever, that Mr. Depp is a ‚Äòwife beater‚Äô and has
committed at least 12 acts of domestic violence against Amber Heard, causing
her to be in fear for her life. In short, the UK Judgement, now final, permits this
court to end the litigation.
According to Johnny Depp‚Äôs lawyer, Benjamin Chew, however, this is not the
first time Amber Heard‚Äôs legal team has tried to get the $50 million defamation

lawsuit dismissed. He noted (via Courthouse News) that this is just ‚Äúthe latest
Hail Mary‚Äù from Amber Heard‚Äôs legal team and that her team has tried to get
the defamation lawsuit thrown out three times over the past two years. Johnny
Depp's team believes Amber Heard's Op Ed in the Washington Post was
defamatory and cost the actor work.
But what about the US? We will talk about that in a second, but now, make sure
you hit the like button if you enjoy this video. It seems like the cases are moving
forward in Virginia. However, they have been expensive, with deposition
requests and more coming from both sides. Both Amber Heard and Johnny
Johnny are digging for additional information that can be used against each
other. Amber Heard, for example, has been looking into Disney and what the
company knew about Johnny Depp‚Äôs actions and behavior during his time on
the Pirates of the Caribbean films. Speaking of Johnny Depp, he has asserted
Amber Heard has lied on several occasions, including stealing her ex assistant's
s*xual as*ult story, and saying she would give their divorce settlement to
charity but didn‚Äôt. In addition, Amber Heard had asserted Johnny Depp was
violent against her but police body cam footage allegedly showed otherwise.
But here is a very interesting moment. According to the police officers who
arrived on the scene (when Amber Heard‚Äôs friends accidentally called 911
twice), there was no visual evidence that a crime had taken place at all. 
...
The court date for the main defamation date is in April 2022 and we will make
sure to be the first ones to deliver the latest news to you. So stay tuned and don‚Äôt
forget to hit the subscribe button not to miss all the details about Amber Heard
and Johnny Depp‚Äôs case. Thanks for watching this video, see you in the next
episode.

Born and raised in Texas, she made her film debut in a minor supporting role in the sports drama Friday Night Lights, followed by a series of other small roles in television and film. snippet.description:
Amber Heard Is In Serious Trouble After Johnny Depp's Lawyers Bring New Evidence
For years now, Johnny Depp and his ex-wife Amber Heard have been clawing back and forth to go and get an advantage over the other in the numerous cases that have been filed by them at each other. Johnny Depp for example filed a Defamation Suit against Heard for $50 million and she filed a countersuit worth $100 million. That case is still going on and has been delayed until 2022 due to the pandemic pushing back scheduling. But even though that‚Äôs going on, there are some things that aren‚Äôt adding up in Heard‚Äôs defense. We‚Äôll break it down for you. Be sure to like the video and subscribe to the channel!

With the initial court date being pushed back, Johnny Depp and Amber Heard have been given some more time in order to gather more evidence for their individual cases. For quite some time, the two were firing evidence at each other in order to win in court. 

Ever since the recent release of the footage of the LAPD officers from the penthouse night of Amber Heard and Johnny Depp, things have not been looking all too bright for Amber Heard. snippet.title: Video Shows James Franco With Amber Heard 1 Day After Fight With Johnny Depp
snippet.description:
Johnny Depp is sending a subpoena to James Franco after surveillance video from the apartment Depp used to share with ex-wife Amber Heard allegedly shows Franco meeting up with Heard just 24 hours after the blowout fight that ended the couple's marriage.

The video, obtained by The Blast, was taken in the elevator of the downtown Los Angeles apartment once shared by Depp and Heard. The time stamp on the video shows it was taken on May 22, 2016, close to 11:00 PM.

Read More: https://theblast.com/c/johnny-depp-amber-heard-james-franco-video

snippet.title: Jason Momoa Tells The TRUTH On Why Amber Heard Was FIRED From Aquaman 2!!
snippet.description:
Jason Momoa Tells The TRUTH On Why Amber Heard Was FIRED From Aquaman 2!!

Subscribe to The Spotlight üëâ  https://bit.ly/3txAgy1

Please support this video by commenting #JusticeForDepp as well as subscribing and giving the video a like to improve the algorithm on Youtube and spread awareness for Depp! üèÜ

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gXMH-KctzgA

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kj_tyMVQcto&t=24s


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


RELATED VIDEOS:üëá

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ShObyc9vqXM&t=6s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k-qJirGb3F4

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pZR2_v4UpgI


Jason Momoa is a name that is buzzing and has been buzzing in the world of showbiz for quite some time. In fact, when Aquaman was released earlier in the year 2018, he was the only talk of Hollywood! 

Due to Aquaman‚Äôs major success, soon after its release, the second sequel to the movie was announced to be premiered in the year 2022. Unfortunately, with the Me Too movement targeting so many A-listers, one of the cast members was accused of being a part of this bandwagon. Any guesses on who fell off the wagon and joined in amongst the list of abusers? Yes, it was Amber Heard!

Amber Heard has been making headlines regularly for almost 2 years now, especially after her divorce from Johnny Depp. Initially, people assumed her to be the poor victim in the chaotic scenario she had going on with Johnny Depp. At one point, we were pretty convinced that she was the victim after she posted her pictures of the scars that she had obtained due to being a victim of domestic violence. 
 
What were Amber‚Äôs claims?

Amber Heard proved to be the biggest victim of the year, with her constant rants on social media as well as her claiming Johnny Depp to be an evil man with anger issues. She kept throwing out lies until one day Depp was forced to sue her, hence causing the famous chaotic court case to make repeated headlines.

How did Ambers Claims backfire?
 
Johnny Depp was proven innocent to his ex-wife‚Äôs claims after a leaked conversation between the two was released, proving that in fact, it was Johnny Depp who was being victimized. This surely didn‚Äôt save the mess he was in but made the likes of big platforms such as Disney apologize to him for believing the allegations.

How did this news worsen?

The Me Too movement was trending and each day a new celeb was being called out for inappropriate behaviour of misconduct with the co-workers, especially the female ones. Due to this being embedded in the minds of all, Depp was the most likely candidate to get abuser-bashed for his immoral actions.

Due to her alleged accusations, Johnny Depp‚Äôs career was quite miserable. In fact, the production teams that loved working with his massive talent started to reject his role in the movies. And all this was due to the fault of Amber and her bunch of lies. Imagine not having Jack Sparrow in the next Pirates of the Caribbean sequel!

What‚Äôs the big question now?

What‚Äôs racing across everyone‚Äôs mind is what does Amber Heard‚Äôs co-star, Jason Momoa, have to say about this? 

As you may be aware, Warner Bros just like all other entertainment entities, have the contents of the contract that they sign with the actors, strictly specifying them to follow privacy protocols, leaving the actors with little to nothing left to say about what goes on with the production of their movie as well as any other activities that take place under the roof of the Warner Bros. 

Jason Momoa has been adhering to the protocol and has not stated anything about the scandal his co-star was involved in. It shows that he doesn‚Äôt care about this blow -up or change in the cast, or that he has been asked by Warner Bros. to keep this situation on the low.

But, was Momoa and Heard compatible in real life as much as they seemed on screen?

Rumor has it that the Momoa and Heard were not as compatible as they seemed on the screen. With them being actors from two different worlds, it is sure to be quite a clash in the studios. But others state that they were actually good together since they were complete opposites and that opposites attract. Even though they seem great together on the red carpet, always having fun, the truth behind this fact is still left unknown!

Would Momoa‚Äôs word and stance on this scenario change the fate of who plays the role of Mera?

Most probably, yes. Without Jason, there is no Aquaman. In fact, the entire success behind Aquaman was 90% due to Jason Momoa‚Äôs efforts in making the storyline as lively. Without him, reaching this milestone would have been highly impossible. On a serious note, it‚Äôs highly possible that rather than risking their biggest asset, Warner Bros. would not sacrifice their king for the sake of Amber!

#AmberHeardFired #JasonMomoa #Aquaman2 #JusticeForDepp #JohnnyDepp #DeppandHeard #Depp
